description: Hanoi Wonderland Homestay is situated in the heart of Vietnam's Capital City - Hano, in Hanoi's most popular tourist destination - The Old Quarter. The Old Quarter is the hub for experiencing Vietnam's rich culture, with not to be missed breathtaking destinations such as nearby Ha Long Bay and Sa Pa. Staffed by friendly locals, certified tour guides, and travel experts, we want to make sure your time in Vietnam is both enjoyable, and memorable! And we also provide free breakfast that guests love. Hanoi Wonderland Homestay is surrounded by local cafes, shops, restaurants, markets, bars, art galleries, and only a 5 minute walk to Hoan Kiem Lake; the most photographed attraction in Hanoi.  We look forward to you staying with us and letting us show you everything Vietnam has to offer! **Things to note & policies** Free cancellation: 3 days before the arrival CVV Requirement: For any nonrefundable booking, please send your CVV code with your booking reference to us. description: The Orchid Hotel in Hue is a new 'boutique' style hotel with 5 star rooms and amenities that one would not expect to see in a hotel of this class, coupled with well presented, friendly staff and excellent value for money the Orchid very much lives up to its corporate slogan, ''Always Most Pleasure''. Rating & Awards: The Orchid Hotel have been well quoted in the new / updated published guide book LONELY PLANET - 10th Edition / July 2009. ( Page CENTRAL VIETNAM ..Hue 225) ' This sparkling new hotel has been receiving rave reviews for impeccable service and sterling accommodation that outstrips its three-star competitors. Beyond the usual mod cons, every room has a DVD player and stereo, and pricier rooms have a desktop computer for in-room internet access ' Ranks #8 of 85 hotels in Hue in TripAdvisor's popularity index ( Rated 4.7 of 5 base on 536 reviews worldwide.) (Source : Tripadvisor.com) What did customers like about Orchid Hotel? 'A Most Amazing Place, and The Most Wonderful Staff Ever' Jul 26, 2010 | Trip type: Business My son and I traveled to Hue for both business and pleasure. We found this hotel on tripadvisor.com, and this is the best place we stayed on our trip through four cities in Vietnam (Ho Chi Minh City, Vung Tau, Hue, and Hanoi). Not only that, it has the nicest and most competent and caring staff of any hotel I have ever stayed in anywhere in the world. What a place! This hotel is beautiful, with curb appeal from the outside, and it is just as attractive inside. Its lobby is intimate and lovely, the dining room has a beautiful decor with a fountain on one wall. The room we were in is elegant, with a wood appointed decor and great beds, with free internet access constantly available on the provided in room computer. The most marvelous thing at the Orchid Hotel is something money cannot buy, a staff that truly is caring and genuinely passionate about providing the best quality service anyone can imagine. From housekeeping to the manager, they were superior. The bellmen where always there to help and to arrange services and trips needed, the receptionists at the front desk were like best friends, making you feel so welcome 100% of the time regardless of which one was on duty (thank you all so very much), the cooks and waitresses in the restaurant always had a great breakfast tailored to individual needs, the driver in the hotel car provided for an out of town business trip to Da Nang and found a conference when I had no real address for it...he was amazing. These wonderful people all make you feel not only welcome, but as part of their family while there. There is a gentleness, and genuiness about this staff that starts at the top, from the manager, Mr Dung,who so obviously cares about his staff and it resonates through the entire hotel. They greet you when you come down by name and worry about you when you do not. They truly care about their guests as if they have welcomed you into their personal homes and show you the best care that I have ever had in a hotel anywhere. This is a world class staff, whose style should be envied by any hotel regardless of how many stars it has acquired. For service alone, on a five star hotel rating scale, this staff gets a rating of ten stars from me. They are over the top, way over the top! If I could make a suggestion, it would be that other hotels world wide should send staff to the Orchid Hotel to see how a hotel should treat guests. It would improve hotel service for any who copied their style and sophistication. I would recommend this hotel to anyone, from travelers such as my son and I, to kings and political leaders. They made us feel like royalty and we are just a teacher and a college professor. We felt as if they scattered flower petals in our paths where ever we went, and somehow, I think they really did. Only they and we know how much that is really true! To the staff of the Orchid Hotel, all of you, I thank you for making our stay memorable beyond belief. You are the best ever. I only wish I could stay with you where ever I go. Somehow that is just not possible, So I must return to Hue to your hotel. Count on it!  View House Rules
name: Orchid Hotel

description: Baloo Hostel is located very close to the center of the ancient capital of Hue. Within a 200-meter radius of the hostel, you will find numerous small restaurants, serving sushi, Turkish kebabs, Vietnamese pork roll and all the food you can think of. If you are willing to stride a few hundred meters further, you will find plenty of bars and restaurants, dedicated to nightlife in Hue. The famous Hue Citadel is also located only 2 km away, and if needed, motorbike rental will be available for longer trips. Baloo is a nice, comfortable and cozy hostel with all the amenities you could ever want, including a bar, kitchen and lounge. There are rooms ranging from classic dorm-style 6 person accommodation to spacious 2 person suites, all of which are spacious and generally more suited towards a more comfortable sleeping experience for our customers in such a noisy and urban area of Hue. During your stay, you can experience the true Vietnamese way of life, as guests are more than welcome to join our family in the daily activity of shopping at the local market. Guests are more than welcome to cook their own meals from the shared kitchen, or join our family for dinner, and learn about the many cultural traditions of Hue. ***Property Policies &Conditions: 1. Cancellation Policy: 1 day before arrival. 2. Check in from 14:00 to 23:00. 3. Check out before 12:00 (noon). 4. Payment: Cash or credit card upon checking out. 5. Taxes: included. 6. Breakfast: included. 7. No curfew. 8. No smoking in rooms, but smoking area is provided (out on Balcony). 9. Reception Working Hours: 24 hours. 10. Child and Extra Bed: (1) Children are welcome. (2) No cots or extra beds are available. 11. Pets are not allowed.  View House Rules

description: Perfectly located in the heart of Hue city, the Why Not? You can navigate most places on foot without getting lost, although bicycles and bikes are available in minutes. In order to ensure that you will have a pleasant stay, we have comfortable private rooms, dorm beds and lots of travelers coming in and out of the hostel, so making friends can be easy. There are two common area to hang out, including a house country western - themed restaurant at ground floor that includes a full bar and pool table. We would like to highlight some useful details for guests who stay at our hostel. description: Welcome to Forever Young Hostel, a newly built hostel run by a (forever) young traveler. Our property offers accommodations, a tour desk, scooter rental and laundry service. What makes us stand out from other hostels? 1. Top-notch cleanliness: The building was recently constructed so cleanliness should be something very obvious. However, we still try to maintain the tidiness every day to make it as new as the first days. 2. Excellent hospitality: Our friendly staff, with unlimited smiles, are willing to help you on everything. 3. Functional rooms: Unlike other hostels in Hue which were converted from residential houses, our building was designed and constructed for hostel purpose. We have common area for socializing, a friendly-looking front desk, a book corner to kill time, spacious dorms with huge beds, and cozy private rooms with en-suite bathroom. 4. Large outdoor areas: Forget about all the cramped buildings in the city center and stay with us to soak up fresh air and authentic local atmosphere. Our hostel is also ideal for those with their own vehicles as there is a generous parking space. 5. Good value for money with a lot of freebies: At an incredibly cheap price, you get more than just a bed: free breakfast, free towel, free wifi, free hot shower, free water refill and free use of kitchen facilities. 6. 'Cherry-on-top' features: We offer fast laundry service which can be in done less than 18 hours; the shared bathrooms are roomy and sufficient so almost nobody has to wait; the showers have amazing water pressure; especially, there is a lovely cat for pet lovers! Come and stay with us and share your stories!  View House Rules

description: Charming Riverside Hotel is located in the city centre of Hue for one to experience the idyllic and quaint beauty of Hue. From the hotel, it is a 10-minute walk to the Imperial City, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, Perfume River, the lifeline of Hue, and Dong Ba Market, a symbol of Vietnamese culture. Our street has many cheap  local restaurants and is only 5 minutes walk from the popular bars and restaurants on Chu Van An street or Phạm Ngu Lao street, by the poetic Huong Riverside. Charming Riverside Hotel seems to be peaceful destination for the guests to see picturesque view of the Perfume River. The well-decorated rooms come with satellite televisions, air conditioners, hot and cold showers, reading tables and desks, coffee machines, tea and coffee bags, flowers. If you arrive at Charming Riverside hotel  before 2pm check-in and  if your room is available, you may check-in early. We also offer: - Free welcome drink . - Free tour informations. - Free Wifi - Free guest computer - Transfer & Pick up at Hue or Da Nang airport by private car - Transfer & Pick up at Hoi An or Da Nang  by private car - Transfer & Pick up at Dong Hoi or Phong Nha by private car - Tour booking service . - Motobike tour to Hoi An / DMZ / Phong Nha ( easy rider ) - Motorbike tours to the Abandoned Waterpark and around Hue city - Bicycle and motorbike rental - 24hr reception/security - Laundry service You will feel home when you step into our hotel - served by the friendly, courteous and enthusiastic people of Hue. Stay at our hotel. Let us serve you. Your happiness is our reward.  View House Rules

description: Sahi Homestay is a eco-focused hostel with dorm-style living where travelers can experience the connection between nature and themselves during their backpacking or holiday trip in Hue city, Vietnam. -Free Wifi -Free Towel -Free Swimming Pool Access -Free Hot Water Shower -Free A/C Bedroom -Free Unlimited Drinking Water (Refillable by Reverse-Osmosis Filter) For your convenience, each bed has privacy curtain, personal power outlet and light. Most days, we have meditation/yoga in the morning if you are interested to join.   We can advise and book local tours and we have motorbike for rent to do your own exploration.  We also have connections in the city for special kind of spiritual and mindful tour, including environmental consciousness and development.  Sahi exclusively serves delicious & vegetarian meal to our guest. As an alternative to alcohol, we have fresh fruit smoothies, coffee and tea available. Tucked down an inconspicuous alleyway, 10 minutes by motorbike from the old city, lies one of Hue’s most aesthetically fascinating homestays.  Sahi Homestay was built to meet the owner’s dream of creating a retreat where guests can relax, meditate or do yoga. It stands harmoniously amongst nature and its neighbors; complementing the alleyway‘s blend of nature and community.  View House Rules

description: Herbal Tea Homestay is a beautiful, friendly, family run business. It is in a fantastic location situated right between the famous Hoi An Ancient Town and Cua Dai Beach, in the quiet village of Cam Thanh. Both loactions are only a short 10-minute bicycle ride away and with free bicyle rental, which couldn't be easier. The property also offers motorbike rental, inhouse cooking classes, tour advice/booking and the staff are happy to help with absolutely anything you need. Herbal Tea Homestay has 12 lovely, comfortable rooms finished to a high standard. Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring flat screen TV, fridge and daily maid service. Free Wi-Fi is available to keep you connected. Modern bathrooms with showers boast complimentary slippers and toiletries. Hidden away at the back of Herbal Tea Homestay is a large, outdoor swimming pool with sun beds for you to relax and unwind. There is an onsite restaurant serving an expeptional breakfast with a wide range of choices, and you will not go hungry. Stay at Herbal Tea Homestay will make sure your time in Hoi An will be one to remember. ***Property Policies & Conditions: 1. Cancellation Policy: 1 day before arrival. 2. description: SERENDIPITY HOSTEL & BAR HAS REDEFINED THE MEANING OF WHAT A HOSTEL IS; WE DON’T BELIEVE THAT A HOSTEL SHOULD ONLY BE A PLACE WHERE YOU JUST LAY YOUR HEAD TO REST IN A BUNK BED. We want you to get the most out of your time in Hoi An, this is why we offer you to join us on day and night time activities like staff beach trips with music, custom designed motorbike tours, movie nights, family dinners & much more. We invite you to stay in our brand new bamboo oasis that is designed for maximum comfort. Our green oasis is located 1.2 km from the main tourist attractions and features a Vietnamese/ Mexican style restaurant, a shared patio with a garden view, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned accommodation, bike rental and a festive vibe in the evening. The beach is a bicycle ride away. On Wednesdays & Sundays you get an opportunity to experience Hoi An’s only hidden event. This unique space pulls in both local and backpacker crowd, looking for one of a kind experience.  View House Rules

description: Located in Thanh  Ha pottery village, next  the Terra Cotta Park in Hoi An Terra  Cotta  Homestay is a great choice for travelers  interested in atmosphere, quiet and away from the big city. All in-house  guests  can enjoy daily  complimentary bicycle. Guests can enjoy or a drink around our garden.  Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Terra Cotta Home is 2.4 km from the old town, 3.0 km the Japanese Covered Bridge and 3.3 km  Assembly Hall of the Fujian Chinese Congregation . The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 24 km from the hotel. All air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. Rooms come with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Guests can approach the 24-hour front desk for currency exchange, ticketing and tour services. Guests are welcomed to rent  motorbike.  Airport transfers  and laundry service can be arranged at an additional charge. This property is also rated for the best value in Hoi An! Terra Cotta Homestay is friendly  and hospitality . On  the way  go to the old town, guest can look the Thu Bon river We have 7 rooms and have  luggage storage space for guests check out.  Breakfast is including your room and good quality. description: Hoi An Life Homestay is located in Hoi An just 700 metres from Hoai River and 3.3 km from Cua Dai Beach. The homestay provides elegant accommodation equipped with hot shower facilities, free breakfast and free bicycle rental services. Free Wi-Fi access is available in this homestay. The accommodation will provide you with a cable TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and towels. Some rooms have a private balcony and a bathtub. At Hoi An Life Homestay you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a shared kitchen. Other facilities offered at the property include shared lounge, a ticket service and a tour desk. The homestay also provides transfer services between Hoi An and Da Nang: Hoi An – Da Nang Airport or train station  and Da Nang city center - Hoi An: 13$US/4 seats/way - 15$US/7 seats/way - 17$US/16 seats/way. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Chuc Thanh Pagoda located just 200 metres away and 2 km from An Bang public beach. This homestay is situated 30 km from Da Nang Airport. The property offers free parking. Come with us and enjoy local life.  View House Rules

description: Welcome to Hoian Cucumber hostel. Cucumber hostel is very closed to the old town. Clean hostel, no bunk beds, quiet place, free breakfast, and friendly people. Easy to meet people and chill out. HOI AN was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage list 1999 and firmly on the tourist agenda. Chinese Assembly Halls, My Son, Full-Moon festival, maritime trade (some history), beautiful beaches and Islands. People generally arrive in Hoi An by private car or shuttle bus from Da Nang (30km). Which serves as Hoi An’s nearest airport and train station. For local information, ask in our hostel: most offer similar services – Tour, transport, rail and air tickets. Graceful, historic Hoi An is Vietnam’s most atmospheric and delightful town. description: Are you looking for somewhere to meet other travelers, that has a sociable atmosphere but won't force you to shotgun a beer at 10am? Then DK's is a fantastic place for you to stay and enjoy the best of Hoi An! We're just a 5 minute walk from the ancient town and it's world famous lantern-lit street, and central to a wide array of bars, restaurants, tailor shops and the beautiful riverside. Highly rated beach An Bang is around 4km away, which can be reached with a leisurely cycle through the rice paddies. We have a fun and friendly team who have loads of experience living and working in Hoi An, which means we can share loads of useful insider tips!  Each day, we offer guests a free beer during happy hour, where we socialise in our courtyard, play cards and share stories about our travels. On other nights, we will often arrange river cruises, buffet dinners or bar crawls, depending on what suits our guests the most. Our rooms are a mixture of private and dormitory style that won't break your budget. All rooms have air conditioning, an en-suite bathroom, storage facilities and everything else you'd expect. Wifi is avaiable in all rooms and public areas. We have a small indoor swimming pool which is great for a dip after a hot day exploring Hoi An. You can ask out staff anything, and if we don't know, we will find it out for you! Come and visit us Hoi An, you will not want to leave, guaranteed!  View House Rules

description: Your gateway to the authentic Vietnam: a homey villa with a local vibe. Our community-oriented villa is your travel hub for discovering the hidden treasures of Vietnam. Run by Hue, a veteran traveler herself, this unique home-away-from-home caters to all your traveling needs. We know that on your journey you need a place not only to rest your head, but also to nourish your soul. Expect to enjoy community dinners, patio guitar sessions, and drop-ins from family and friends. The homemade breakfast, fresh smoothies, and Vietnamese specialty coffee are made to order for you with love. Located a convenient walk from the old town, the Light Villa is also the perfect getaway from the hustle of the city.  Enjoy a peaceful night’s rest with only the sounds of nature lulling you to sleep. We are blessed with both great sunset and sunrise views over a vista of rice fields. We set you up with everything you need to navigate Vietnam with comfort and ease. Hue will keep you in the loop about local events, connecting you with the side of Hoi An that travelers don’t often see. We will let you know where to find the best deals on food, tailoring, tours and rentals. Experience the best of what Vietnam has to offer, and know that you always have friends at the Light Villa. Policies 1. Cancellation Policy: 24 hours before check-in. No -show/late cancellation charge equals the balance of 1st night fee 2. Check-in from 14:00 to 22:00 (if later, please send a message) 3. Check-out before 11:00 4. Payment upon arrival by cash only 5. Quiet Hours from 9PM to 7AM Transfer from Da Nang, we offer a pick-up service. This service will be cheaper than a taxi from the airport. 300.000 VND / 3 Seats private car 350.000 VND / 6 Seats private car 500.000 VND / 15 Seats private van 130.000 VND / p.p. for a shuttle bus If you want to use our pick-up service, please list which service you would like to use, the number of people, flight number and arrival time. You can contact Hue VIA Whatsapp or send an email to us. Thanks ! ***All payments are to be made here at The Light Villa, so please be sure not to pay the driver by mistake.*** Amenities - Free healthy breakfast and tea made to order - Free Wi-Fi - A/C and fan in every bedroom - Bicycle/scooter rentals with local price. - Assistance booking tours, bus/train/flight tickets, airport transfer at ***local prices*** - Family dinner only on Tuesday and Friday (100,000 VND/ person) - Free evening snack on Monday and Wednesday  View House Rules

description: *Hoi Ans premium Accommodation for travelers* *Weekly and Monthly accommodation available* Stunning outdoor pool and terrace *Free Breakfast * Free towel rental * Free water * VBH’s famous nightly events * Free shuttle buses to old town and beach * Western Staff and Local staff * 24/7 reception and security * Cashless wristbands * Welcome to Vietnam Backpackers Hoi An Hostel! Our modern and welcoming Hostel is located between the historic UNESCO town of Hoi An and some of Vietnam’s most incredible beaches, including Kahuna's Hoi An Beach Club. Opened in early 2017, the hostel has a stunning waterfall pool, loads of awesome common areas, a deck overlooking lush rice paddies and a large alfresco style bar and restaurant with daily happy hours and free drinks! We have an incredible team of staff from all over the world who will make you feel at home right away and with hosted lively events including pool parties, quiz nights, beer pong, themed dress-up nights you sure will create memories to last a lifetime!  At VBH Hoi An we offer: - FREE Towel Rental - FREE Shuttle buses to beach and old town - FREE WIFI - FREE computers for guest use - FREE breakfast - FREE parking - FREE water refills - FREE luggage storage - FREE movie room - Air-conditioned rooms from 5PM-10AM - 24-Hour Reception & Security - 2 High Speed Elevators - Airport  & train station pick ups/drop offs - Visa Invitation Letters - Bicycle rental - Stand Up Paddle Boarding - Stunning Swimming pool and terrace - Library & Gallery - Nightly events and Live DJ's   Our stylish and clean dorm rooms range in size from 4 beds to 6 beds, with mixed and female only options. We also offer splurge-worthy double and twin privates, with walk-in closets and flat-screen TVs. All bathrooms, both private en-suite and communal, feature state of the art fixtures, including rain-head showers. *Private rooms come with FREE bicycle rental* We have awesome travel desk staff who are ready to help with all your travel needs. Feel free to speak to them about anything from local daily recommendations to full country itinerary planning, including a visit to our hostels in Hanoi and Hue; an escape to paradise at our backpacker resort, Ninhvana; a chance to chill in our NEWEST Mui Ne Backpacker Village; a stay in our awesome city hostel in Saigon; a rural countryside adventure in the North AND of course, the infamous Castaways Island trip in Ha Long Bay! For group bookings, we will try our best to assign you all in the same room, but sometimes due to the small dorm size we might not be able to do that so please take notice before making a reservation  We look forward to showing you an unforgettable stay in Hoi An and throughout your travels in Vietnam!  Best, The VBH Crew  View House Rules

description: The Seaside Bungalow has been designed to provide affordable lodging in a relaxed environment. It is a rustic beach house B&B nestled In the dunes just a short walk from Ha My Beach.  It is located in the quiet seaside village of Ha My. The beach sweeps to the north vanishing out of sight and seemingly ends with the skyline of Da Nang City 20km to the northeast. The hostel  is  1-minute walk to the beach. You can enjoy the on-site restaurant/bar with good homemade food, super comfy beds, lockers, free towel, ultra clean rooms, hot showers and super friendly staff who will help in any way they can. There is a big garden with chairs and hammocks to chill out after a busy day. We also offer: - Free Breakfast - BBQ and Bonfire on the beach on Tue, Thu & Sat (BEACH PARTY coming soon) - Free bicycle tour on Monday & Friday - Family dinner on Monday & Friday at The Destination Hostel (our sister hostel in town) - Free guide street food tour on Wednesday & Free Rum Coke (at The Destination's Rooftop Bar) - Free wifi whole area - 24 hours front desk - Scooter/bicycle for rent - Airport/ Train station pick up/ drop off - Tour information -Camping on the beach in summer The beach is a doorstep away so you can enjoy the big clean nature swimming pool every day. It is 100 m to the beach, while Hoi An Historic Museum is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Da Nang International Airport, 19 km from The Seaside Bungalow. If you check in after 6:pm, please send us an email, if not we'll  automatically sell your bed. For group booking, we will always try the best to put you in the same room. The Seaside Bungalow has been welcoming  guests since October 10, 2016  View House Rules

description: Chez Le Anh Homestay is situated in Hoi An, 1.6 km from Hoi An Historic Museum and 2.2 km from Assembly Hall of Chaozhou Chinese Congregation, only 800 meter to the Hoi An old quarter and 2km to An Bang Beach. Guests can enjoy cafe home made with nice view terrace or sitting at balcony. Communication so fast and easy. Our house is the lovely perfect place to spend your time in Hoi An. We are a family of 2 and we have been living in Hoi An for many years. We are very happy to have guests from all over the world to our house to exchange culture. We have comfortable, clean rooms with cosy atmosphere. Breakfast is included in the room rate which is served downstair of our house. It takes only 10 minutes walk to the old quarter so it would be so easy for you to get around the city. We are also very near to some mini marts, grocery store, especially close to Hoi An local bus station and Hanh cafe . **Things to note & policies** Cancellation policy: 3 days before arrival day. Check in from:14:00 Check out before 12:00. Payment upon arrival: cash. Taxes included. Breakfast included. No curfew. Child friendly. No smoking in the room; but we have certain smoking area. description: Situated on Hue's main walking street, our hostel is perfectly located to explore the many sights that the city has to offer. Vietnam Backpackers Hostels - Hue is housed in a beautiful, colonial building with sweeping verandas perfect for kicking back with an ice cold beer. Our awesome downstairs Sports Bar has killer events, DAILY happy hours, and is the perfect spot to meet some new mates and head out to explore the historic Imperial City. We also offer: -       FREE WIFI -       FREE water refills -Countless Day trips including our legendary Hue Motorbike Tour finishing at the abandoned water park -Dragon Boat Trips -       Ziplining -       Cooking Classes -24 Hour Reception & security -Airport Pick Ups -Visa Invitation Letters and more Our travel desk in Hue offers a huge range of tours and experiences in the surrounding area and is happy to help plan any onward travel both north and south from the midpoint of the country. Feel free to speak to them about anything from local daily recommendations to full country itinerary planning, including a visit to our hostels in Hanoi and Hoi An; an escape to paradise at our resort, Ninhvana; a visit to our newest Backpacker Village in Mui Ne, and a stay in our lively Saigon hostel; rural countryside adventures in the North AND of course, the infamous Castaways Island trip in Ha Long Bay! We look forward to showing you an unforgettable stay in Hue and throughout your travels in Vietnam! The VBH Crew  View House Rules

description: If you arrive at Khe Sanh before 2pm check-in and your bed/room is available, you may check-in early. We also offer: - Free breakfast: from 7.00am until 10.00am - Free Wifi - Free City map - Free Tea all day - Free guest computer - Free Towel - Personal lockers with each bed - Our homestay also provides FAMILY DINNER by Vietnamese food the cost is 60.000vnd/person (at least 2 people order and two hour before) - Tour booking service - Motorbike tours to the Abandoned Waterpark/ Hoi An and more… - Easy rider to Hoi An and more... - Bicycle and Motorbike rental - 24hr Reception/ Security - Laundry service Khe Sanh is a chilled, family run Homestay located in the heart of Hue, a perfect base to explore the city from. Our street has many cheap, local restaurants and is only 3 minutes walk from the popular bars and restaurants on Phạm Ngũ Lão street, by the poetic Huong Riverside. We offer private ensuite rooms as well as spacious dorms with shared facilities, all have powerful air-conditioning. Dorm bed have storage lockers and access to a private balcony. Our rate includes breakfast, and towels can be provided upon request. Sit and enjoy a local beer with us in our common area area, we are happy to answer any questions you have about Hue, or Vietnam in general. description: a-mâze house is located in the heart of the Old quarter of Hue. It is just tranquil enough for you to have a good rest, but central enough to explore Hue specialties within reach. More than 400 year old Feudal heritage and history are all around the corner. Local market is less than 1km from the property. Ngu Ha river, Tinh Tam Lake takes only three minutes walks. Moreover, you will be stunned in front of the Purple City in less than 5 minute ride. The hostel is also the space harmonizing between the man, and the nature that have been practiced for decades as our family tradition. Typical street activities also appear more and more on this walking street. This is truly an ideal location for dating, fun, entertainment, and many other activities. description: As the first 'poshtel' (posh hostel) in Hanoi, we bring an unconventional experience, not a motel, not a luxury hotel - providing you a pleasant stay as a place to rest so that you can enjoy your journey and recharge for your next destinations. Our hostels are posh, with attentive design that caters needs of our guests. It is everything we want in a hostel: a nice place to rest, clean and a good night sleep that is very affordable, nice balcony and an hidden gem rooftop for chilling, also a great bar in house with craft beer and local cocktails. You will find our bunker bed with 5-star-quality linen, soft topper & double pillows (yes TWO for your craving of fluffily soft surrounding), private curtains and noise-reduced wall.  Here at Backy we offer female dorm and mixed dorm. Hair-dryer, shampoo and bath cream are available in each bathroom. In-house tea and coffee are free for self-serve whole day. Shared kitchen with cooking amenities are available for you 24/24h. Stay with us, you also have chances to join our free events every week as Cooking class, Family Dinner, Walking & Local Food tour, Vietnamese Class, Explore Local Street beer,... with our enthusiasm staffs. Location is in the Old Quarter, you easy to walk to many bars & restaurants, coffee shops. It takes about 10 mins walk to bar streets, 15 mins to Hoan Kiem Lake. Guests who stay with us also are provided with: - Free Wi-Fi everywhere - Breakfast included (We offer a great breakfast with cereals, toast, fresh local fruits, tea, coffee and juice). - Personal lockers with each bed for your valuables. -Free towels, slippers in house. - Free Luggage Storage after check-out are available. -Co-working Space -10% off all drinks at Saint Giong Bar (at G-floor) - Female only Dorms. -We only accept bookings less than 20 days. - Free tour information - Airport pickups upon request. In case your booking via any website and do not either register for children aged five years or older or request for extra beds, please follow the Hotel’s Children Policy when you check in. description: Our stunning mansion boasts an outdoor SWIMMING POOL allowing our guests to chill out and escape the tropical heat and chaos of Vietnam’s capital. The complex has plenty of common areas & social space. We host regular bar & poolside events featuring live bands, DJ’s, along with regular BBQ's & plenty of games such as beer pong, quiz nights, comedy nights... We are located within the “Westlake” area of Hanoi which provides a relaxed, safe environment for guests – with bars, restaurants, and entertainment just seconds from the hostel,  whilst only being a short inexpensive Grab bike or car (from $1) away from Hanoi’s famously chaotic Old Quarter. We provide FREE  BREAKFAST & a tea or coffee for all our guests every morning. Our mixed dorm rooms are spacious, EN-SUITE and 24/7 A/C (air-conditioned or heated). All beds have personal multi country CHARGING POINTS including 2 x USB ports & READING LIGHTS as well as big, super comfy MEMORY FOAM MATTRESSES and secure digital ELECTRONIC LOCKERS and room KEY CARDS. We have a FULLY STOCKED BAR servicing the pool area and our IN-HOUSE RESTAURANT; serving up HOME COMFORT food and classic VIETNAMESE DISHES and can provide WATER REFILLS from our filtered water tap. Our in-house facilities include our own TRAVEL DESK – offering the best handpicked tours of northern Vietnam – including Ha Long Bay, Sapa, the Northern Loop and Phong Nga. We also extend and arrange visas, plus  train, bus and onward travel. We also offer a LAUNDRY SERVICE as well as TOWEL and HAIR DRYER rentals & our very own unique American war Jeep city and lake tours or join us on the west lake cycling loop and explore a different side of hanoi. We are within convenient reach of the airport and the main train and bus stations in the city. --- 5 - 10 min drive to & from the Old Quarter - ‘Grab’ bike or car from only $1 --- 30 min drive from or to the airport - Transfers can be arranged, please contact us directly to arrange this. Bicycles are available to hire – with many guests opting to cycle the entire 12km around West Lake. Things to note - Reception working hours - 6am to 10pm - Kitchen working hours - 12noon to 8pm - Bar working hours -  6am till late - Night security working hours - 10pm to 6am If you have any issues at all during your stay, please speak with a manger so we can fix it! 7Fridays West Lake Hostel - Get that Friday feeling every single day! Terms and Conditions: Free Cancellation: 24 hours before the arrival Check in - From 2pm Check out - Before 11am Payment on Arrival: Cash Only All Taxes Included & No hidden extras All rooms are non-smoking, however we have covered smoking areas Age Restriction:18 yrs+ No outside alcohol or food allowed  View House Rules

description: Hanoi Culture Hostel is conveniently located at centre of Hanoi Old Quarter, 7 minutes on foot from Hoan Kiem Lake, Thang Long Water Puppet theater, nearby Ho Chi Minh Complex, The Temple of Literature and shopping and dining spots like Bat Su Street. It’s surrounded by many Restaurants, Bars and Banks. Cozy, comfort and accommodating, we offer Vietnamese cultural style decorated . Internet with computer at lobby and hotel-wide WIFI coverage ensure effortless connectivity for entertainment, family contact, and work. Accommodations at Hanoi Culture feature hardwood floors and air-conditioning. All rooms come with bathroom ensuite, Laptop support at the reception desk, cable flat-screen TV, drinking maker, free Wifi connection, Mini bar, Telephone, Wadrobe, Dressing table, Tea/Coffee maker, Working Desk. Restaurant is available for your daily complimentary breakfast. Welcome drink is offered upon your arrival. Select rooms feature a private balcony. Property facilities include a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk where guests can arrange for day activities to attractions. The hotel features a Vietnamese restaurant which provides local specialties. Room service is available.  View House Rules

description: Babylon Garden Hostel & Spa is a brand new and the first hostel in Hanoi which have Indoor Swimming Pool, Restaurant & Bar and provide Spa service. Located in the middle egg of Hanoi's Old Quarter, Babylon Garden Inn is brand new hostel with convenient walking distance to local restaurants, street foods vendors and bars street, must visit tourist attraction (Dong Xuan Market, Bach Ma Temple, Old Gate,etc). It features a terrace, privacy bed dorm with curtain and area entertainment : Rooftop bar & Restaurant (happy hours everyday) , Free wifi access all building, Spa, Football table, Library area, Summer Indoor Swimming Pool, Enthusiastic and friendly staff team. We offer both dorms and private rooms, all of which inclusive menu breakfast and air-condition, free towel during the night to ensure you have a comfortable nights’ sleep. Our rooftop bar & restaurant serves up tasty local & some western foods and DAILY happy hours! We have events including beer pong, beer buffet, themed dress-up night and more…!!! Fearture Events: - Happy hours : Free fresh cold beer service in-house guests everyday from 06:30 PM to 07:30 PM on rooftop bar city view, serve food & drink all day - Event everyday: Beer Pong Tournament/ Flip & Stack Up/ Lady Night - Spa Service: Special Promotion for In-House guest (discount up to 45% for some package) We also provide: - 24 Hour Reception with Friendly English speaking Staff - Airport Pick Ups - Visa Invitation Letters - Organise package tours Halong Bay, Sapa, Ninh Binh,etc (with special rate for tour booking online) and provide transportation bus, train, flight ticket We always willing to give you tips & helpful information for your travel needs. Feel free to contact us about for local daily recommendations to full country itinerary planning inclusive a rural countryside adventure in the Ha Giang Loof, Halong Get away trip run by our amazing 5 stars quality party cruise, Sapa Trekking, Ninh Binh etc We look forward to showing you an unforgettable stay in Hanoi!  View House Rules

description: Right in the heart of Hanoi’s Old Quarter, our Downtown Hostel is known for its legendary bar, nightly parties and is a constant hive of activity. It is close to delicious street food and happening nightlife. Downtown offers both dorm and private rooms, all of which include breakfast and are air-conditioned during the night to ensure you have a comfortable nights’ sleep. Our restaurant and bar serves up tasty comfort food, local Vietnamese specialties and DAILY happy hours! We have awesome events including quiz nights, beer pong, themed dress-up nights and much much more…!! We also offer: - FREE WIFI - FREE BREAKFAST - FREE computers for guest use - FREE walking tours through the Old Quarter - FREE water re-fills - 24 Hour Reception with English and Vietnamese speaking Staff - Airport Pick Ups - Visa Invitation Letters - Chill-out floor with a pool table, foosball and comfy sofas and bean bags - Large TVs by the bar so you don’t miss out on your favourite sports - Outdoor roof terrace with a great streetscape view - AND of course, our legendary free Nightly Pub Crawl We have awesome travel desk staff who are ready to help with all your travel needs. Feel free to speak to them about anything from local daily recommendations to full country itinerary planning including a visit to our hostels in Hue, and Hoi An; an escape to paradise at our backpacker resort, Ninhvana; a stay in our lively city hostel in Sai Gon; a rural countryside adventure in the North AND of course, we can’t forget to mention that we are the home of the original Castaways Island trip in Ha Long Bay! We look forward to showing you an unforgettable stay in Hanoi! Cheers, The VBH Crew  View House Rules

description: Flipside Hostel is a Kiwi owned and operated hostel in Hanoi and as New Zealanders, we love a bit of adventure!  We have over 8 years of experience in the backpacker/adventure industry in South East Asia. In this time, we have grown to understand that what makes a country so memorable is to have a real mix of nightlife, culture and of course ADVENTURE! It doesn’t matter if you’re looking for a cheap, comfortable, clean dorm bed for you and your friends to rest your weary heads, or if you’re looking for a private room for a slice of peace and luxury that we all need from time to time - we have you covered! And they all come with a yummy free breakfast! On our top level we have a brilliant view of the Hanoi skyline from our awesome rooftop bar. Enjoy the coldest beer in Vietnam and rock out to some banging tunes while you overlook a beautiful sunset and get ready to party the night away with a bunch of like minded travelers before departing on our free nightly pub crawl! ***Property Policies and Conditions*** 1).2 days advance notice for free cancellation. 2).Our check out time is before 11am and check in time is after 1pm. 3).We accept cash payment only upon arrival. At FlipSide Hostel we have check in reception 24 hours a day, 24 hour security and a helpful travel desk open from 6am-10pm. motorbike parking is available right around the corner from the hostel. As we have a variety of private rooms and dorms, we can cater for most types of travelers. As long as you're willing to have a good time, come join us!  View House Rules

description: Nexy Hostel is conveniently located in the heart of the Old Quarter in Hanoi. Only minutes walk away from attractions such as Hoan Kiem Lake, the Ho Chi Minh Complex, Bia Hoi corner, Night Market and many local spots to eat, our location is just awesome. We have a bar and cafe with great happy hour deals everyday. We also have cosy hangout areas such as a games room, TV room with beanbags, library with free computers and a rooftop. You can easily chill out and make new friends here. Choose from a great selection of rooms, from dorms to private rooms with super comfortable beds. Each of our beds are specifically designed to cater for the needs of the modern traveler. Our beds are fully equipped with their own privacy curtain, electric sockets, reading lamp and complimentary lockers. Guests love our 14 bed mixed dorm. It's our most popular room and never feels like there are 14 people. Guests who stay with Nexy are provided with: - Complimentary Wi-Fi everywhere - Complimentary breakfast. We offer an awesome breakfast with homemade Pho noodle soup, cereals, toast, fresh fruits, tea, coffee and juice - Complimentary linen and towel - Complimentary personal lockers with each bed - Complimentary Luggage Storage - Female only Dorms - Airport pickups - 24 hour reception To get the most out of your stay speak to our travel experts and we will help you plan your stay that will take you to all the hidden treasures this incredible country of Vietnam has to offer. We look forward to giving you a warm welcome at Nexy Hostel in the near future. Team Nexy  View House Rules

description: 'A HOME AWAY FROM HOME' Conveniently located in the heart of Hanoi, Old Quarter View Hanoi Hostel offers 3-star accommodation close to Quan Chuong O street, Dong Xuan Market and Ta Hien Street, very easy to meet people. This is less than 1 km from Thang Long Water Puppet Theater and a 11-minute walk from Ngoc Son Temple. There is a common terrace and lounge with special event 'Free Beer for every day afternoon at 6pm to 6:30pm'. We have bunk beds and different dorms with modern factilities, specially with curtains for each bed. The rooms have big bathrooms with high cleanliness. Some rooms also have a balcony. Wi-Fi is free for all guests. Guests can enjoy a daily continental breakfast at the property and we have a restaurant with a varied menu that can serve you up to 10pm. The staff is available in English at the reception desk and is available 24 hours a day. Along with other great services such as tour information, visa service, transfer service and more. This place is also considered to be the most valuable in Hanoi! You will save more than you would like to stay at other accommodation in this city. SPECIAL OFFER: HALONG BAY TRIP (1 day, 2 days 1 night, 3 days 2 nights,..), SAPA TRIP (2 days 1 night, 3 days 2 nights,...), HA GIANG TRIP (3 days 2 nights, 5 days 4 nights, ...), NINH BINH TRIP (1 day, 2 days 1 night,...), MOC CHAU, MAI CHAU and more. Visa service, Flight/Train/Bus tickets to DONG HOI, HUE, DA NANG, HOI AN, HO CHI MINH CITY, etc… which are highly recommended by previous Guests with best price and quality assurance. Please feel free to contact us anytime or visit our website: http://oldquarterviewhanoihostel.com/ for further information.  View House Rules

description: We all welcome you to our hostel! Little Charm Hanoi Hostel- Where the little things mean everything! These are the reasons you need to choose us for your stay in Hanoi: - Location: Ideally located in the center of Hanoi Old Quarter, only a few steps to Hoan Kiem Lake, Ngoc Son Temple and Thang Long Water Puppet, just 1 minute to the night market and Bia Hoi Corner. - Facilities: Little Charm Hanoi Hostel offers a swimming pool - a good place for you to chill out and a restaurant that was designed in Italian style serving you for both lunch and dinner. - Rooms: We have a lot of selections for you from a mixed dorm to only female dorm, we make sure that you will find your favorite type of room and enjoy your vacation. All the dormitory rooms are equipped fully and comfortably facilities with nice style and have air-conditioning, soundproofing and private curtain which certainly bring the best stay in Hanoi. Each bed has a personal reading light, one small multi-function locker which could be used as a table work right on your bed. The big lockers for luggage and the door are both operated by the automated swiper card which absolutely ensures safety to bring peace of mind and satisfaction for the guest. - Breakfast: The breakfast is served at the lobby of the hostel which is a combination of buffer drink, fruit, and A La Cart menu that is a great start for your holiday. - Staff: We are proud to introduce that staff is one of the most appreciated elements at the hostel. The friendly and enthusiastic staff with 24 hours service are always willing to assist the guest with the travel information, bike rental, luggage storage, laundry services. - Tour Service: To get the most out of your stay speak to our travel experts and we will help you plan your stay that will take you to all the hidden treasures this incredible country of Vietnam has to offer. We look forward to giving you a warm welcome at Little CHarm Hanoi Hostel Hostel in the near future. Little Charm Team.  View House Rules

description: Hanoi Central Backpackers Hostel created by an awesome local guy that brought you Central Backpackers Hostel chain in Vietnam, like no other and you know we have got it right. With all of the same charm and deals to suit the needs of today’s travellers with no hidden costs. Also still cheap for those on a budget and as always we will cater the price to suit your needs.  The amazing things about Central Backpackers Hostel - Old Quarter are first and foremost the nightly great big parties till 11:00pm, lively atmosphere, awesome people you meet, who will be sharing their travelling experiences from all around the world in the communal area over 1 or 10 beers at happy hour and more..! Secondly the brilliant and friendly staff that will go out of their way to ensure your experience is the very best you can have whilst in Hanoi. So the only thing you need to do is ask for whatever you need then we will help you to sort it out. Our travel desk team always be happy to help you out with planing or any tours booking and of course we do highly recommend our Halong Hideaway Tour, Sapa Trek Homestay, other daily tours and settle your onwards transport or get help with visas. Just step into our lobby or contact us in advance. You can also book all of our adventurous packages in advance. We offer both dorm bed with privacy curtain and private room so itsn't matter that you are traveling alone, with partner or even your family we could deal with all you need. We also have 24 hour reception so you can easy to do later check in or early check out. All the HOME COMFORTS you would expect comfy beds,hot showers/baths, clean rooms, fully A/C... We also provide loads of FREE things: - FREE BREAKFAST 7:00AM - 9:30AM - FREE BEER 7:00PM - 8:00PM - FREE Walking tours through the Old Quarter, start every day  at 10:00AM - FREE Pubcralw every night, start at 10:00PM - FREE Wifi  View House Rules

A new hostel with a vibrant atmosphere ideal to use as your base while exploring the North of Vietnam. Our beds are designed to provide the maximum comfort and privacy and they all come with high quality bed liners, power sockets, reading light, mini fan, personal locker and a curtain. Socialize when you feel like it, get some privacy the rest of the time. We offer both Private and Shared rooms. description: Located on the scenic Cổ Cò River and in very close proximity to the infamous An Bang Beach, the River Park Homestay offers a fantastic alternative to those wishing to escape the hustle and bustle of towns and cities whilst still remaining extremely accessible to all amenities and attractions within Hoi An by foot, peddle bike or motorbike. Both peddle bikes and motorbikes can be rented through the homestay at very competitive prices, and for your ease you can also book all tours and onward travel arrangements here too. The homestay offers accommodation options on both a private and shared basis, and each room is equipped with air conditioning and ensuite bathroom facilities with toiletries also provided free of charge. Each room also has at least one window, many of which have excellent views over the scenic Cổ Cò River. Furthermore, free tea, coffee and breakfast is included for all and we also provide laundry and cooking facilities on site. At River Park homestay we pride ourselves on our English Language and knowledge of the local area in which we can share with our guests, and we look forward to welcoming you to our property. ***Property Policy and Conditons: 1. Providing that the room/ bed is available, guests are able to check in early if needed. However, the earliest time for check in is 7am so as not to disturb current guests. Check out is at 12 noon. 2. Free breakfast, tea and coffee is included as well as meals for lunch and dinner at affordable prices. 3. Guests are able to pay for the accommodation using both cash or card payments. 4. At least two days notice is required for free cancellations. 5. 24/7 security and doorbell facilities are in use at the homestay at all times.  View House Rules

description: @ Almond Villa & Hostel located 5 bicycling minutes from the center of Hoi An City, 10 minutes from the city's Main Market, some steps from the local market, mini mart, bakery close to the area & complete with a breath taking only 15 minute scenic bicycle route through rice fields to the amazing An Bang Beach @ Staying with us, guests are not only treated as a guest, but also guests feel like a home away from home. We strive to make all the guests happy and had the memorable experience at this Villa @ Almond Villa & Hostel has 9 rooms with 2 buidings, the front building with 3 rooms upstairs & the back building with 6 rooms (3 downstairs & 3 upstairs), the swimming pool is midle of 2 buildings. The cozy atmosphere and an airy,  pool. Each room at this family stay is air-conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Certain units have a private balcony area where you can relax and enjoy Vietnamese coffee / beer or read a book. The rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower. The rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower. @ The back building with 6 rooms (3 downstairs & 3 upstairs), private room with private bathroom fitted with a shower. @ Almond Villa & Hostel is located quite close a few steps to the crossroads (traffic light) on main street (where the local Bus "Yellow Bus" drop you off or pick you up) + Bakery / Mini mart / Pharmacy / Local Restaurant (Vietnanese Phở - Beef Noodle)  is also within 1 mins walk. + Local market is also within 1 mins walk + Just a 5-minute ride in bicycle or 15 minutes peaceful walk to the central market. *** At Almond Villa Hoi An & Hostel, we offer our guest : - If you stay for 3 or more nights, the last night before leaving, my family will invite you to dinner to say thank you for coming and staying with our family, moreover it is our hospitality. description: Chieu Ha Village will deliver you a peaceful home-like experience when visiting a new land. You will experience a combination of old and new between the comfort of modernity and the peacefulness of Hoi An Old Town’s revered beauty. All rooms are designed according to the standard of a modern 4-stars hotel while at the same time they bear on themselves marks of Hoi An’s old house which consists of Paifang (a three-arched entrance gate), Yin/Yang tile roof, and wooden balconies. There is a pool located in the middle of Chieu Ha Village where you can swim or simply tan yourself and enjoy the sight around you. A mini botanical garden surrounded with tree-gates, fragrant with jasmine-flower scent, and submerged in a rustic space which can be found nowhere else is available for those who love coffee and conversations with a friend. The L-shape design of the Village allows mosts rooms to enjoy the view of the pool and the surrounding sight. Chieu Ha Village lies at the heart of Hoi An—one of the world’s natural wonder, the tropical center of Vietnam consisting of two distinct seasons where you can discover the distinctive culture within peaceful rustic villages and Hoi An’s memorizing sights. Sun beams on the beach, a walk around Hoi An Old Quarter, the ancient city with green-mold old houses date back to hundreds of years, and a heart-warming space arose by flower lanterns often launched upon rivers are all the characterizations of Hoi An. During festival seasons, guests will have a chance to discover the local custom and culture of Quang Nam people and to celebrate those festivals such as Tet New Year or Mid-Autumn festival at Chieu Ha Village. Come and enjoy the nature organic alarm made of rooster crowing in the morning, the resonance of bird chirping together with the hospitality and the comfort complemented by private modern rooms as of luxurious hotel that you deserves. During festival seasons, guests will have a chance to discover the local custom and culture of Quang Nam people and to celebrate those festivals such as Tet New Year or Mid-Autumn at Chieu Ha Village. Contact us  to enjoy nature  View House Rules

description: Our first class facilities ensure Hoi An Paradise Hotel is the perfect place to enjoy a relaxing holiday, a business break or romantic gateway. The hotel has a large freshwater swimming pool, and a tour desk is always available. A pool table is accessible to guests, and there is Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. The rooms look over the swimming pool, the main street or the back of the hotel, and are equipped with up-to-date features such as IDD telephone, refrigerator, cable LCD TV with satellite channels, self-controlled air conditioning, bathroom with modern shower, hot and cold water, hair dryer, writing desk, and tea and other facilities. The hotel has a very informal atmosphere which makes guests feel comfortably at home. With its friendly and professional staff, whether you are visiting for business or pleasure, the Hoi An Paradise Hotel is a good choice if you are wanting to enjoy the old world charms of Hoi An and the other world heritage sites nearby. The Restaurant and Bar on the third floor offers authentic Vietnamese and selected Asian and Western specialties. It is a perfect place to relax and unwind, and our facilities include a large outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers.  View House Rules

Our Homestay has free Wi-Fi, breakfast garden and serving area, lockable storage and laundry services. All guest rooms offer air-con and are equipped with thoughtful amenities to ensure a relaxing and comfortable stay, with a common seating area to unwind at the end of a busy day of sightseeing or shopping. description: Charming Homestay is right between the old town and the Cua Dai beach -2km away from each, which takes only 10 minutes by bicycles or 5 minutes by taxi. It is very easy to discover many attraction places of Hoi An by our free bicycles. Ideally situated in a great location which is only 2 km from Hoi An center and 2 km from Cua Dai beach, with nicely decorated rooms made from natural local materials and beautiful garden in the area of 500 square meters, our house is the best place in Hoi An for those who would like to enjoy a comfortable stay in a cozy homey atmosphere. There are six charming rooms in our house, one room is for us and the other five rooms are for our guests who would like to experience the daily life of the local charming people. For many years, we know first-hand the joys and challenges of navigating a new culture, making friends and learning a language. We look forward to helping you with your transition to Vietnam, starting with feeling “right at home” with a terrific host family. Welcome to our house. We can hardly wait to meet you! SPECIAL PROMOTION: STAY WITH US FOR MINIMUM 3 CONSECUTIVE NIGHTS you will be offered one free morning cycling to the rice field and market visit with me. description: Hoi An Ancient town is known as one of UNESCO’s as the World Heritage Sites Viet Nam. In fact, within central Viet Nam itself, there is 4 UNESCO’s Heritage site that you could visit in your single journey! VENUS HOTEL & SPA is located in the town itself and it is accessible to most of the popular tourist sites; such as the Japanese Covered Bridge.  This “Venice of the East” old town offers a charming walking opportunity where lots of secrets once hidden at every corner of this sleeping trading port back.  Furthermore, one of the most popular An Bang Beach for foreigner and local alike is about 4km away where you could cycle in late afternoon and enjoy the sunset while having a beer or two.  The hotel offers an outdoor pool and modern rooms. Venus architecture is based on the Hoi An charm mixed with modern influences which is only visible in this part of the country. The hotel offers 40 spacious rooms to all our distinguish guest who are either coming for visiting, honeymooning or spending family vacation.  Come and stay in Venus Hotel & Spa and let us spoilt you with our great hospitality and leave behind a perfect memory for your perfect vacation.  View House Rules

description: Conveniently located just a 5-minute drive away from Hoi An Ancient Town as well as Cua Dai Beach, Lotus Hoi An Hotel is an elegant resort-style hotel drawn from a range of styles and influences resulting in a perfect blend of Eastern culture and French architecture. Lotus Hoi An Hotel comprises 58 rooms and 2 suites, all rooms are fully contained and fitted with a combination of traditional Vietnamese and French-style furnishings. They all have a private balcony offering beautiful views of the swimming pool or the garden to feel the finest touch of hospitality and comfort. With extensive spa facilities, guests can relax with a pampering beauty treatment or a massage at Lotus Spa. Alternatively, indulging yourself with a fresh cocktail at Lotus Bar or enjoy a dip in the pool after a hard day of sightseeing. Lotus Restaurant also offers a variety of traditional Vietnamese cooking classes, this helps to discover the local market and how to make traditional Vietnamese dishes to bring home a memory. With professional and friendly staff, Lotus Hoi An Hotel ensures to make your stay an unforgettable experience in elegance.  View House Rules

description: Mr Tho Garden Villas are a quiet, secluded set of 5 villas rooms in a garden setting with 2.000 square meters. Each room rate includes free bicycle hire, breakfast, water & instant cafe. Our garden villas face out to our gardens with a swimming pool surrounded by Native Vietnamese flowers. The villas face to the west so the afternoons are cool with a light breeze and the mornings are not too hot. Because the villas are set in the countryside we have many birds visiting in the morning and the evenings are quiet because there is very little traffic in our area. Each villa is equipped with TV, free Wi-Fi, tea and coffee making, air-conditioning and bathroom accessories.  Transport can easily be arranged to town if you don’t wish to use a bicycle. Most of Hoi An is flat so riding around is not difficult. Nearby sight-seeing includes Hoi An’s Do river, the surrounding coconut plantations and the paddy fields. description: Loc Phat Hoi An - Villa is run by Mrs. Linh, whose family has lived on the same property for 4 generations. It’s named after my sons, Phat (which means development) and Loc (Luck). My roots stretch back to a small fishing village near Hoi An beach, while my husband’s family has lived on the property I now operates from for over a century. Linh claims to have established the first professional homestay in Hoi An and everything I has learned during my time working in hospitality is visible in the day to day going-ons of the Villa. Stay for a night and you will notice the family’s impact on every aspect of life in Loc Phat. Linh’s children, nieces, and nephews run around and play with their toys, my father-in-law stands aged and smiling as security, my sister greets you from behind the reception desk, my sister/brother-in-law serve you a complimentary breakfast, and my aunt will clean your room. In fact every employee of the homestay is a member of the extended family. ”We respect everything we have, because we are very lucky to have it” The homestay is more than just a business for us, it’s a way of life. The Homestay Villa has recently added brand new buildings to its complex, so visitors no longer live within Linh’s home, we have our own beautiful modern private rooms to retire to, all built around the tranquil garden. However interaction with the family is still a large part of the experience, and any guest who wishes to sit down for a chat or simply observe is greeted with open arms and a smile. Linh is an intrepid and well versed cook, and I exhibit my skills for the dinners I enjoys cooking for my guests for someone stay in the Villa are looking forward to have cooking class you will be composed of Cao Lau noodles (made from a secret recipe that is known to only one family in Hoi An), green mango salad, fresh spring rolls, and the famous Hoi An pancakes……….. with Linh for a home cooking class. Linh also takes great pleasure in talking with my guests and spends hours of my day interacting with anyone who has a question or is curious about the Hoi An way of life. I will organize any manner of trip for her visitors, from a excursion to a lantern making shop, a trip to a local market for ingredients used in the cooking class, or mundane things like arranging taxi service to the airport…………etc. The Homestay likes to give back to the community and every year Linh and my husband sponsor the education of two children, one from Linh’s fishing village and one from Hoi An. Since there is no such thing as free public school in Vietnam many children, especially the third or fourth born in any family, are in danger of missing out on a formal education. Linh was one of only five children to go to school in her village, so she has a deep empathy for the plight of uneducated children in the region. In addition the homestay also gives away a bicycle to one lucky child at the end of every year. If you haven’t already gathered we were charmed by Hoi An, Loc Phat Hoi An Homestay Villa, and the family living there and operating it. If you want to experience an authentic slice of Vietnamese life within Hoi An City, book a stay at the Homestay Villa. You will be welcomed to the family with big smiles and open arms. We thank you again for choosing Loc Phat for your stay in Hoi An. Linh Family and staffs. Loc Phat Charity Fund. As we are part of the Hoi An community we believe it is our role to give back to our community. We do this by helping children from poor families who show high academic skills, with the costs of their education. The Loc Phat Charity Fund was established in 2011 and since that time we have been able to grant scholarships to 6 students who have shown academic excellence and meet the criteria. Each scholarships is to assist the children through their primary and secondary schooling and is worth 150 usd per year, which over their time at school for each child is 1800 usd ( approx). During this time each children is monitored on their continuing academic performance. By providing this scholarship we are helping to grow the future for not only Hoi An but our Country. We would like to invite you to make a contribution to our Charity and we would appreciate any Amount you can provide. In return we will keep you informed on the children's progress and Show you how they are improving and growing into confident and productive young people. Please see me - Linh about contributing or just ask the staff to find me. Thank you for taking the time to read this message and we hope you will join us in helping the Children of Hoi An during their education. Linh and Rocky - owners of Loc Phat  View House Rules
name: Loc Phat Hoi An Homestay - Villa

description: With an idyllic location on Vietnam’s culturally rich central coast, Hoi An Local Villa is nestled amidst an immense palm forest and natural waterways of Cam Thanh Coconut Village. The villa is positioned strategically in the countryside within a short ride between the sandy stretch of tranquil beaches and Hoi An ancient town - UNESCO World Heritage Site, an exceptionally well-preserved former trading port. Our Villa offers 13 well-appointed rooms with direct natural light overlooking the surrounding lush green mangrove ecosystem. Our internationally trained local team aims to deliver beyond our guest’s expectations and enthusiastic to share its kept secrets of the city’s best escapades. Hoi An is a hub for leisure and pleasure with contagious energy. From its strategic spice trade history, its discernible foreign-influenced architecture, its unique biosphere reserve, its vibrant food scene, its reputation as the center for the culture and the arts, its relaxing tropical beaches to its bucolic villages, and most importantly, the kindliness of its inhabitant will charm every journeyer. We offer : - FREE Wifi - FREE Bicycle - FREE bottles of water in every room. - FREE parking - FREE luggage storage - Swimming pool - Luxury private rooms and dorms with amazing mattress and cool air - Unique experiences discovering the local culture: cooking lesson, local farmers visit, city food tasting, Hoi An hidden places ... Best regards, Hoi An Local Villa  View House Rules

description: WELCOME TO LITTLE DIAMOND HOTEL 2! Little Diamond Hotel 2 is located in a quiet alley, right across the street from Hoan Kiem Lake at the heart of Hanoi old quarter and within 2 to 10 minutes walking distance to tourist attractions and basic amenities such as the Water Puppet Theater, the weekend night market, major international banks and ATMs, grocery and convenient stores, shopping streets, restaurants and nightclubs. Guests may choose between single, double or twin room or a newly renovated 3 person. All with classic wooden furniture, their own private modern bathrooms and air conditioning. All our rooms are serviced daily. Guests have access to free tea and coffee throughout the day. For the convenience of our guests, we also offer tourism services on demand and our knowledgeable staff can provide no-obligation information on tour options and make booking arrangements for Halong Bay, Sapa, Hoalu, Tamcoc, the Perfume Pagoda, City tours, Mai Chau, Hoa Binh or customized private tours to most regional destinations. Our staff can also help our guests with flight, train and bus bookings as well as visa extensions. We provide airport pickup upon request 350,000 vnd( 15 U$)/ private 4 seats car(provided relevant flight details) Thank you for your trust and continued support. We want to help make your stay in Hanoi as pleasant and worry-free as possible! PROMOTION! *Free Welcome drinks! * Breakfast is included Services: SE Asian Visas and Visa Extensions Domestic and International Flights Train and Bus Tickets Vietnam Tours (Halong Bay & Sapa) Motorcycle Rentals Airport Pick-up and drop-off Restaurant with breakfast Internet 24hours for free Foreign exchange Please note: Check in is from 14:00 Check out is up until 12 noon Credit cards are accepted and are subject to a 3% service charge Cancellation policy is 48 hours before the day of arrival. description: WELCOME TO LITTLE HANOI HOSTELl!  We are located in the old quarter of Hanoi and is situated close to all of the popular attractions like the water puppet show, tourist streets and Hoan Kiem Lake. All rooms  have modern facilities. Those of us who work here are like one big family - as such, this is the way we treat our guests. All the rooms are clean, comfortable and spacious. They have hot water 24 hours, cable TV, A/C, and modern bathrooms with bathtubs.  Those are just the necessities - as a special extra, you will have fresh fruit and flowers brought to your room daily. Breakfast is included at our Price List from July 21st, 2018. Our restaurant is located in the lobby where you have access to FREE internet  and WI-FI. There are all types of rooms to choose from:Double, Twin, Tiple or Family rooms Getting information about all kinds of tours that meet many styles and budgets for every traveler is easy!!!  Just ask our helpful staff at reception. Our main focus is on Halong Bay and Sapa Tours. We are more than happy to arrange some great day trips and excursions around Hanoi and to the surrounding villages for you. Our number one priority is giving all of our guests an excellent holiday in Hanoi. ROOM INCLUDES: *Free Welcome drinks! *Even if you are not staying with us overnight, and are just between trips and need to freshen up, you have free access to our shower facilities *Free Tour Information. description: xin chao (Hello, in Vietnamese)! When you stay at Daisy Hostel, you check in as a guest but leave as part of my family. We're located in the heart of Hanoi's famous charming Old Quarter, within close walking distance to all the historic sites, museums, the famous Hoan Kiem lake and plenty of delicious restaurants nearby. Our rooms are cozy so you can get to know your fellow travellers - choose from 4-bed and 6-bed, female, male or mixed dorms. so you have lots of energy to explore the sights! For however long you stay with us, or wherever you are going next, we can help with all your travel plans, bookings and make recommendations. This is your home away from home, and we look forward to welcoming you to Hanoi and at Daisy Hostel! HOW TO GET TO DAISY HOSTEL -From the airport (33km) +Random taxi : 400.000-500.000 + Daisy car : 380.000(max 3 pax) +Local bus : Moahhh… so cheap and easy 30.000-(bus number 86 –orange colour) -From the train station (2km) +walk ( free ) -15 minutes +taxi : 30.000-40.000 depend how kind is driver +motorbike : 20.000 check in time from 12:00,you can check in anytime after check in time. description: Diamond Dorm was started in 2016 under the design of Painter Nguyen Quoc Dan, drawing a colorful art and a view of Hanoi in the 60s, from architectural characteristics to daily supplies of Vietnamese people. Overcoming the basic rules, Diamond Dorm wants to give you the experience in an artistic space from Cafe to Dorm. The artistic combination of wood and copper brings a space that is both traditional and unique. Besides Dorm's basic design, we give our customers a new definition of high-class Dorm, high level of service and art that you can't find in any other hotel or dorm. Diamond Cafe is nestled in Diamond Dorm. Inspired by old cafes, you have to go through stairs to the 3rd floor. When entering, you will be immensely overwhelmed with the art space from the pictures of Hang Trong are meticulously painted on the wall so you cannot take your eyes. Diamond Dorm features 24-hour reception, dry cleaning and housekeeping on site as well. ***Property Policies & Conditions: 1. Cancellation Policy: 3 days before arrival. 2. description: Our Hotel is located on the large & quiet Ly Thai To street which is very close Hoan Kiem Lake( symbol of Hanoi Capital), ANZ bank, Opera House ( was built in 1911 by the French), shopping area, just next to a bunch of traditional Vietnamese, Indian, Italian and Asian cuisine restaurants. Each room is equipped with facilities such as: antique wood furniture, wood floors, satellite TV, a mini bar, working table, wardrobe, bathtubs, air conditioning, telephone, and ADSL Internet connection for you convenience. We are one of the tallest buildings in the Old Quarter and have installed an elevator connecting the nine floors and 25 guest rooms for convenience during your stay. There is also a restaurant and bar on the ground floor, offering European and Asian food for breakfast. With our new look we aim to create a new standard of hotel service in Hanoi that is honest, helpful, friendly, and informative. To make your holiday stress free you can book tours and transportation in the hotel. ****************ROOM INCLUDED **************** * Internal Hanoi calls free. * High speed internet (ADSL), wifi free of charge. * Luggage Porter & Storage room. * House keeping daily ****************HOTEL SERVICES*************** + Buffet Breakfast with a lot of choices costs 2 USD per person + Taxi airport pick up and drop off: $US 15/way. + Daily city tours and surrounding like Hoa Lu, Tam Coc, Perfume Pagoda, handicraft or traditional villages. - Organising the packages tours to Halong Bay, Sapa, etc. - Visa application and extensions - Trains and flight ticket booking - Bus to Nanning, China, Laos and Ho Chi Minh City - Car service, motorbike and bicycle rental Thank you for choosing Kingly Hotel for your accommodation in Hanoi. description: Welcome to Bubba Bed Hostel. Our fresh and friendly place has only recently opened. Come and meet our super staff who will cater to all your backpacker wants and needs. In a buzzing part of Hanoi, with the standard of accommodation at a price that is hard to find. Perfectly located, directly opposite the 'Old City Gate' in Hanoi's Old Quarter. Situated within walking distance of most of the attractions the city has to offer and a short taxi ride to the others. The infamous nightlife is just around the corner, but far enough so as not to inconvenience your sleep. We have 8 and 10 bed dormitories and a private room. All at cheap prices with rooms that will exceed your expectations. DORMITORIES .Solid bunkbeds (wobble free experience, top or bottom) .A/C and Fan .Light and Socket per bed .Bathroom for every room .Balcony overlooking the 'Old City Gate' in every room .2 Privater lockers per bed .Thorough daily house-keeping PRIVATE ROOM .Comfy Double and Single bed .Modern fully equiped kitchen .Ensuite bathroom .Large flat screen TV and satellite .A/C .Private balcony .High Ceiling (light and airy room) .Remote operated lighting OTHER FACILITIES .Foods & Drinks .PS4 .Tourist Information on sights and activities in Hanoi, arrange transportation, book tours and generally go out of our way to assist with any inquiries .Bar and kitchen open all day (Set menu at backpacker prices) .Common room with TV and satellite, assortment of games and books, sofa and bean bags .Free luggage storage for guests on short term trips .Laundry service, bike hire, towel rental We endeavour to provide an environment which cater to those who wish to socialize and relax, and share laughs and experiences with like minded travelers from across the world. But we understand the need to have some downtime, kick back and recharge your batteries! We look forward to meeting you and sure you will enjoy your time with us.  View House Rules

description: See You At Lily's Located in the very heart of the charming historic Hanoi Old Quarter, at 16 Ngo Huyen Street, near St Joseph's Cathedral. Our hostel is situated on a calm street, which offers you a perfect retreat from the vibrant and buzzing Old Quarter, just minutes away. We have two newly fitted mixed dorm rooms, each with 8 beds whilst we have one female dorm room with 6 beds. We provide a large selection of foods for breakfast, mainly western style. We have a lot of experience and knowledge of the local area. See you At Lily's also provides various services from laundry to open bus tickets, tours around Vietnam (SaPa and Ha Long Bay) at a reasonable price for our guests. We also exchange money here, and sell beers for people to enjoy in our chill room. We are now doing introductory cooking classes, free walking tours and vietnamese family dinner in the evening.  Please email or ask at reception during your stay for more information. There is WIFI on every single floor to accommodate everyone's needs. ***Property Policies and Conditions*** 1).The reception is 24hrs however check in from 2pm hence if you would like an earlier check in then you must email us before hand. Check out time is 11am. 2).2 days advance notice for free cancellation. 3).We accept credit card and cash payment upon arrival. 4).We do not allow children under the age of 16 in the hostel without a guardian, if children want to stay at the hostel, we must be emailed in advance. We also have a no pets policy. No drugs are to be permitted into the building due to it being illegal in Vietnam. We provide alcohol though you must have you're ID to be served at the bar. 5).Maximum stay is 14 days. 6). Towels available free of charge for private rooms. Dorm rooms- towel available with deposit and nominal cost (under $0.50 USD cost). 7). Lockers for valuables available in Dorm rooms, deposit required for the key.  View House Rules
