description: Welcome to IVINA Hub! A hostel-but-more-than-a-hostel for 8 people. A place to fill your Vietnam cultural experiences. From bed & breakfast to entertainment, work space, traditional pottery workshop, phở cooking class,... we provide them all and ready to serve you on spot. THE DORM: The room has a capacity of 8 people. There are 4 bunk beds. - Comfortable cabins, beds with personal wardrobe and shelves. - Small table for guest gathering or playing board-games. UNOOO! - Books in your cabin. - Equipped with air conditioner for those who can’t handle the weather of Vietnam (additional complimentary fans if requested). - 2 Private Bathroom It takes around 10 minutes on foot to reach the West Lake. Here, you can choose from a selection of restaurants and bars. There are quite a few temples and pagodas that are accessible by foot. We are also famous for having the biggest flower markets and flower gardens. What’s better than going to a water park on a sunny day in Hanoi? Luckily, the West Lake Water park is only 5 minutes away. IVINA Hub Policies: Cancellation policy: 1 day before arrival. description: AZ Hanoi Hostel, is in the heart of Hanoi’s Old Quarter, AZ Hostel is the ideal Hostel to stay offering a friendly and quiet place away from all the Hustle and bustle of Hanoi streets, with it's comfy and quiet atmosphere, it is a place you can just rest an relax before continuing your journey through Vietnam. AZ Hanoi Hostel staff are always pleased to welcome you as part of their family to ensure that your time in Hanoi and Vietnam exceeds your expectations and are happy to share their knowledge of Vietnam with you. AZ Hanoi has three types of rooms catering for everyone from Private rooms, Mixed Dorm rooms (Standard and Deluxe). With shared bathrooms and amble hot water there is nothing not be liked about the Facilities at AZ Hostel. A comfortable Lounge to relax in and breakfast is available from 7:30 to 10am. Centrally located in the heart of the Hanoi Old Quarter AZ Hanoi is within walking distance from most major attractions and is a great place to start your exploration of Hanoi and the amazing street culture that Hanoi is famous for from street vendors or to simply taste some of the most amazing street food. AZ Hostel is your one stop, shop for all your accommodation and specialist travel needs from our organized tour packages to all major destinations from Hanoi, or if you wish to travel independently, we can support all your travels with great advice with bus, train or flight tickets to ensure your experience in Vietnam meets your expectations and more. We want you to love Vietnam as much as we do. Tour Packages Including: •Sa Pa •Ha Long Bay •Ninh Binh •Purfume Pagoda •Mai Chau Our Service include: •Money exchange •Air Port Transfer •Visa Applications •Bus Tickets •Train Tickets •Flight Tickets •Motor Bike Rental •Laundry Service You can also check or inbox us via Facebook Page Instagram or our Whatsapp Always be at  your service. description: The Pavilion Hotel and Travel Services are situated on Ma May Street, in the heart of Hanoi’s famous “Old Quarter” district and surrounded by a plethora of restaurants, bars, nightclubs, street food vendors and vendors selling all sorts of differing produce and products. The street becomes a “night market” on Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights, when vehicle access is not permitted and it becomes a “Walking Street”, that is, it is a pedestrian only precinct. The hotel itself was first opened in 2012, but has been tastefully renovated in 2017 by its new owners.The hotel has French architecture, an elevator, a restaurant, very clean rooms, and a professional and friendly team of workers dedicated to ensuring your stay in Hanoi will be both unforgettable and memorable  View House Rules

description: The hotel BC Family Homestay - Hoan Kiem Lakeside is a true «2-star Boutique». Without the luxury of a traditional boutique-hotel, it has all its other characteristics such as its exceptional location, the elegance of its decoration, its equipment, and the personalization of the services.Only 4- 5 minutes walk to Hoan Kiem Lake, Heart of Vietnam and Hanoi city, with a lots of Green Trees, Plants, flowers. The alleys are where BC Family Homestay’s is at our best! Alley 9a Trung Yen - Dinh Liet street is perfectly located for travelers seeking authentic Vietnamese culture while having all the modern convenience just a few steps away. Get lost in this massive enclave of urban Vietnamese culture by simply stepping outside our gates or escape from the 24/7 city-bustle of Hanoi old quarter for a peaceful night of sleep. At this house, our common space includes a large common area, Private rooms/ Dorm rooms/ Apartments,a covered balcony,and our main office on the ground floor where guests... When you are using our services, you helped local people and poor children. we are giving 15% of our profit towards charity projects. BC Club – a cultural and social organization began from December 25, 2006 to the present. We are working hard together with the community to help disadvantaged children in Vietnam to approach Education, Health and Culture Exchanges with the best quality. BC Family is a Social Enterprise. description: The Eighty8 Hanoi is a modern hostel, in the heart of Hanoi and Old Quarter, that provides the best comfort and convenience during your stay in Hanoi. Located in the heart of the center of Hanoi, right next to Hoan Kiem lake (Sword lake) and St. Joseph's Cathedral church, where is the busiest part of Hanoi's downtown which is super easy to walk to all of tourist attractions such as Hanoi Opera House, Dong Xuan market, Hanoi weekend night market, Ta Hien nightlife street, Turtle tower, Temple of the Jade Mountain, Old Quarter… Moreover, our place is also in the center of Hanoi food culture with all the famous and traditional restaurants surrounding. Only 6 bunk beds in our big 40m2 room with private bathroom each, give our guests most comfortable as possible. Our bunk beds are unique in town with comfortable size: 2M long (6.56ft) and 1,2M width (4ft). Besides, there are reading light, laptop table and charging system inside each bunk bed which promise our guests the most pleasant stay. Eighty8 Hanoi Hostel features quite a few comfortable extras, such as a rooftop chill-room with a cozy TV; waiting room and 24-hour reception. We also provide free city walking tour. description: Welcome to North Hotel No. 2 in Hanoi, Vietnam ! Our North Hotel No. 2 has been recommended in the new editions of Rough Guides Book, Lonely Planet and some other foreign guide books such as Guide du Routard. North Hotel established since 1990, has two hotels, North Hotel No.1 and North Hotel No.2. They are located in Hanoi Old Quarter, very near Hoan Kiem Lake, in the city's historic center. All our rooms in North Hostel No. 2 are very well equipped with standard wooden furniture: Beds, Wardrobe, Table with chair; Fan and Air-Conditioner or Heater; Private Inside Bathroom with Hot/Cold water; Cable TiVi, Refrigerator; Telephone, WIFI in ALL ROOMS. This price are special prices for direct booking online and included all taxes and fees but NOT included the breakfast. Our North Hostel N.2 provide other services as follows : - 24 Hour Check-in and 24-hour Reception. - Laundry service. - Luggage storage, Free of charge for our guest. - Money exchange. - Telephone and FAX Service; Free Printing travelling documents for our guests. - Assist with Tour Information: Hanoi City Tour, Tour to Ha Long Bay-CatBa Island, Hoa Lu-Tam Coc, Mai Chau, Sapa - Bac Ha. - Tourist Bus Ticket Service: Everyday Tourist Bus (Sleeper Bus): Hanoi-Laocai-Sapa and Open Tourist Bus (Sleeper Bus): Hanoi to South Vietnam stopover many interesting places such as Ninh Binh, Hue, Hoi An, Nha Trang, Dalat, Mui Ne and Hochiminh City at Local Rates. - Airlines and Train Ticket Service: To any where in Vietnam, as well as from Vietnam to other countries. - Car or Jeep, Motorbike and Bicycle rentals. - Assist with New VISA applications or VISA extension. Free Hanoi Map and  Free Cable ADSL and WIFI high speed internet service is available free of charge and also free cups tea are provided for thirsty guests. We can arrange also the transportation from Hanoi International Airport to our hotels, at THE LOCAL RATES, on notification of flight details : Estimated Arrival Time, Flight number, Name of Airlines Company, From Where to Hanoi. The friendly atmosphere of North Hotel No. 2 have made this place a favorite with backpackers in Hanoi, Vietnam. And also there is very comfortable place for those who need a place to stay for study or short time working in Hanoi. description: Australian Managers Luke and Sarah.  Australians excited and happy to call Hanoi home; we want to make your stay in Hanoi a truly wonderful, cultural experience. Let us get you off to the right start in Vietnam. Hanoi Rendezvous Hotel is situated in the heart of Vietnams Capital City; Hanoi, in Hanois most popular tourist destination; The Old Quarter.  The Old Quarter is the base for experiencing the intriguingly crazy beautiful culture, with not to be missed breathtaking destinations such as  Ha Long Bay, and Sapa close by. Hanoi Rendezvous Hostel is surrounded by local cafes, shops, restaurants, markets, bars, art galleries, and only a 5 minute walk to  Hoan Kiem Lake; the most photographed attraction in Hanoi.  You are undoubtedly at the doorstep of experiencing real Hanoi life when you stay with us. This newly renovated Hostel, boasts extremely spacious rooms, offering panoramic views from your balcony, brand new western style bathrooms, and comfy beds.  All rooms feature air conditioning, mini bar, and an LCD television, with free wifi throughout, and free internet computers in the Lobby. At Hanoi Rendezvous Hotel we will make sure you get the most out of your stay in Vietnam. Our tours are guaranteed great value; big breakfast; fruit, tea and coffee available all day, restaurant catering both Vietnamese and Western cuisines, bar, and gift shop for all those Western comforts you miss while traveling. When you first arrive in Hanoi; this renowned, distinct culture of conical hats, motorbikes, beeping horns, and plastic kids chairs can be a lot to take in, being former travelers ourselves; we understand the importance of  a comfortable, stress-free stay, and have arranged tours; handy facts and information; and 24hr Reception, to ensure the most valued experience possible. Book with Hanoi Rendezvous Hotel today to guarantee a truly amazing stay in this exciting, vibrant and captivating city.  View House Rules

description: Hanoi Old Quarter Homestay opened as the interfering cultural place to connect friends with new friends. The homestay couldn’t be more authentic without my family, all raised and born in Hanoi. As a longstanding Vietnamese tradition, my family includes three generations: Me and my wife Nguyen Nhu Quynh (Name of the flower which only hatch in midnight of the lunar new year) – She works as the official staff. She also can speak Chinese because she lived in Shanghai for 3 years. We have a 20 month-old son together, his name is Do Truong An (Peaceful forever). Nguyen Do Khai – My younger brother – a high school student. Nguyen Viet Thuy – My father – He is a retired cook. He can help you with the Traditional Vietnamese Food with an authentic taste. If you want to learn how to cook some tasty Vietnamese dishes or enjoy a family dinner, feel free to inform me in advance then we can prepare the dinner for you. Finally, my mother Do Ngoc Lan also the Housekeeping Executive – She has been working in three star and four star hotel for 15 years. So you can feel the cleanness, comfort and relaxation at my home. === ACCOMODATION == The homestay is located in the Old quarter, the heart of Hanoi, surrounded by good restaurants and shops, in green, quiet streets within walking distance of Hoan Kiem Lake which is the perfect environment to enjoy your holidays. The cosy rooms are lovely decorated with air-conditioning. Some of the rooms have a balcony with a nice view of the Old Quarter streets. The others rooms are located in the back of the building, which guarantees you a relaxing and quiet night. === EXTRAS === Pick up service from and to the airport / Renting or buying motorbike / Laundry / Family dinner Property Policy and Conditions: 1. Check in Time: after 14:00 2. Check out Time: before 12:00 3. Both cash and credit card payments are accpetable upon check in at the property. 4. At least 3 days advance notice for free cancellation.  View House Rules

description: Hanoi Stars Hotel has just opened on Jun, 2009. It is one of the most beautiful and comfortable hotels in the center of Hanois OLD QUARTER. Hanoi Stars Hotel is ideally located in the heart of Hanois Old Quarter, just a minute walk to the famous lake - Hoan Kiem Lake (Returned Sword Lake), and offers a modern and diverse range of facilities and services. It is convenient for guests to walk in the shopping areas and to find the best local restaurants, as well as banking. It is close to the central business district, major non - governmental offices and the famous Water Puppet Theater, a must-see places for all visitors. It is a great value for those who wish to enjoy this impressive city. With spacious and well-furnished rooms, Hanoi Stars Hotel offers you much more value than a 2 star hotels. All the rooms in the hotel have wooden floors with brand new equipment. These include: IDD telephone, air-conditioning, safety deposit box cable TV, DVD player, Mini bar, comfortable bath room in all the rooms, hair-dryer, coffee and tea making facility and daily fresh fruits and flowers. Private computers with ADSL or Wi-fi are both at the lobby, FREE of charge. Come to Hanoi Stars Hotel, you will be very satisfied with our professional services and experienced and enthusiastic staff. Presently, we are delighted to provide any tour informations in the all regions of Viet Nam, beside that we could offer many different packaged tours from the north to the south. Especially, the private or group tours to Ha Long and SaPa are available everyday with the best quality and the most competitive price. * We also can arrange a visa to Lao or Cambodia and extend your Vietnamese visa. * We have the ability to book the air/ train tickets to Lao, Cambodia and other famous domestic locations, such as Hue, Hoi An, Nha Trang, Da Lat, Mui Ne, Sai Gon and of course you can travel there by open bus. * In order to satisfy your needs when staying in Viet Nam, we possess several different motorbikes, bicycles and cars for rent. Special Promotion: All day Tea and Coffee be served Free at the Lobby. Free internet at the Lobby Free: Tourist Map of Hanoi Free: store luggage during period time you travel. Please Note that! Go holiday with our hotels for the most competitive prices, the best qualities and 100% refund for any poor service tours Warning!! !. There are a lot of touts and bogus cabbies as well as indecent tour information counters at Noi Bai airport, who try to cheat you to another hotel for commission such as, they secretly contact their hotel-partners and then impersonate our hotel staff to speak to you on the phone that, the hotel you booked that is full already and offer you another hotel or some scams like that....... In order to avoid cheated by them please email me and let me know your flight number as well as its arrival time to Noi Bai airport and then our hotel driver, who holds the big Board with your name and hotel name at the arrival gate of terminal airport and pick you to your reserved  hotel. For those of you just passing through we offer a transit stop so you can securely store you backpack while you wander around Hanoi and grab a shower before leaving on night trains and buses for other exciting destinations. The Hotel offers you more convenience & comfort for your stay in Vietnam. This is the ideal place if you want to meet and share your traveling experience with others. After bookings, please inform us of your flight number and arrival time via our e-mail. Coming to Hanoi Stars Hotel you will feel like at home!  View House Rules

description: Hanoi’s Old Quarter is one of the most lively, energetic, joyful, and wonderfully hectic places in Southeast Asia! That’s where Spoon Hotel is located. However, it’s tucked away so that the busy excitement is all around it, but it won’t overpower you. It’s great! In three minutes you can get to Hang Da Market, a three story mall of shops and stalls for items ranging from new and second-hand clothes, fabric, and jewelry, to cooked Vietnamese snacks, fresh fruit, flowers, and wine, to surprises of many kinds. Also in three minutes, you will find the Viet Nam National Tuong Theatre to enjoy some of the oldest performing arts of the country. In five more minutes, you can choose from Hoan Kiem Lake, Ngoc Son Temple, Thang Long Water Puppet Theatre, St. Joseph’s Cathedral, and the Hoa Lo Prison Museum. Spoon hotel can provide you comfortable private room in Hanoi. Moreover, you can easily walk to the Temple of Literature, the Ho Chi Minh Complex, and the Hanoi Train Station...... description: Hanoi Family Homestay is convenient to everything, but tucked away from the main street in a quiet courtyard. We're a short walk from many of Hanoi's best sites, including the Old Quarter, Lenin Park, the Thang Long Citadel, the Army Museum, Hoan Kiem Lake, Train Street, Food Street, the Water Puppet Theatre, and more. We are a family-friendly homestay and we have two children and a cat - a 15 year old daughter (Anna), a 12 year old son (Monkey) and Soc (the cat). When you stay here, you are not just a tourist, you are a family friend. This is how we run our homestay and we invite you to experience Hanoi with us from a very local point of view. Our rooms are clean, quiet, secure and a great value. We will do everything possible to insure that you have an amazing stay with us! Coffee, tea, drinking water and a good breakfast are all included in the room rate - if you need anything else, just ask. All rooms have free wireless internet, and we'll provide you with a map so that you can find your way around the maze of streets in the Old Quarter. description: *Tam Hostel Saigon is not a 'party hostel', but we are a place to chill, relax, recharge, socialize and to rest well after a long day. If this sounds like your kind of place, please come visit us. We would love to host you.* Tam is located close to all of the action, but tucked-away on a quiet street so that you truly relax when you get back after your day of exploring Saigon. Want to enjoy a leisurely cà phê sữa đá while watching the neighbourhood life flow by? Our main floor café space is the place for you. How about drinking a local beer without having to go to a bar? Tam’s chill private rooftop terrace is the place and Saigon’s many craft breweries provide lots of options. And at Tam, we’re here for you, whether that means finding you a great local spot to eat, connecting you with local artisans for those unique gifts, and helping you plan out the next steps on your Vietnamese adventure. When it’s time to sleep there are comfortable dorm beds and a range of well-appointed private rooms for couples, families and whoever’s sharing this experience with you. Tam is more than a place to stay, its experiencing Saigon, while supporting local businesses, producers and charitable causes. However long you stay with us, know that we will leverage your travel dollars to help support initiatives such funding the education of children who could otherwise not afford to go to school, efforts to remove landmines from the former battlefields of south-east Asia, as well as promoting sustainable agriculture and renewable energy. Interested in more details? Ask us. These initiatives are close to our heart and supporting them is one of reasons why we founded Tam. If you believe that travel can be a force for good and that are individual actions can make a difference, then join us and help to amplify our collective impact. We look forward to welcoming you to Saigon! Love, Team Tam Hostel Saigon  View House Rules

description: Amber Hostel is located right beside Bui Viện Street, just 1 km from Fine Arts Museum, 1.3 km from Takashimaya Vietnam and 1.5 km from Ben Thanh Street Food Market. The property is around 2.2 km from Union Square, 2.3 km from Ho Chi Minh City Hall and 2.4 km from War Remnants Museum. The hostel provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, ticket service and free WiFi. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Tao Dan Park, Ho Chi Minh City Museum and Ben Thanh Market. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 8 km from Amber Hostel. **Things to note & policies** Free Cancellation: 1 day before the arrival without being charged by the property Check in from: 14:00 pm Check out before: 12:00 pm Payment on arrival: cash and credit card Tax included Breakfastnot included No curfew No smoking in room, but have smoking area No age restriction Reception working hours: 24 hours  View House Rules

description: At The Prince of Whales Hostel & Bar, you will be within steps of popular attractions, including the “notorious” town of the backpackers (1 minute), the renowned Ben Thanh Market (5 minutes) and the hustle and bustle Chinatown’s Great Market (10 minutes). If it’s not the comfortable beds with great air conditioning, hot and cold shower at the property after a long day outdoors, it’s certainly the great food and drinks as well as the astounding services provided by professional staff that you will fall in love for. Complimentary free Wi-Fi is available on site to keep you connected. There is luggage storage and coffee/tea in a common area. ***Property Policies & Conditions: 1. Cancellation Policy: 2 days before arrival. 2. Check in from 14:00 to 22:00. - Passport & Visa must be presented at the reception as part of Vietnam Immigration Law. 3. Check out before 11:00. 4. Payment upon arrival by cash and credit card. - Extra 3% surcharge is applied when using credit card. 5. Taxes: included. 6. No curfew. 7. Strictly no smoking in rooms, but smoking area (Rooftop Bar) is provided. 8. Reception Working Hours: from 07:30 to 22:30. 9. Age Restriction: The minimum age to check is over 16.  View House Rules

description: We start our hotel business from 12/2018 till now. 24h Saigon Hotel located in the very center of the city, a few minutes of transportation to the most popular attractions of the city like the Independence Palace, Saigon Skydeck, Ben Thanh Market, Bui Vien walking street, and many more. In addition to the excellent, our hotel position at the meeting point of a bus line straight to the airport, the hotel is surrounded by the city center’s elegant shops, cafés, restaurants, bars, and other tourist sights just a few minutes from the hotel. Hospitality staff, brand new equipment, unique design, and well-prepared service will make your stay in Ho Chi Minh more memorable. Rooms equipped with air-conditioned and free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. Terms & Conditions Cancellation policy: 2 days before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay. Check in from 14:00 to 23:00 . Check out before 12:00 . 24 hours reception. Taxes not included - 2% Breakfast not included. No Curfew. Lock out from 03:00 until 08:00. Child friendly only if staying with the guardian in private rooms. Non smoking except specific areas. House rules: - Please keep in mind the other guests that want to rest and avoid making noise in the room or in the hallway after 11 p.m. - For safety and hygiene reasons preparing of hot meal or drink in the capsule is not allowed. The fine for smudging the bed is 20$. - Open fire, smoking, candles are not allowed in the capsule. We have designated smoking area at the balcony. The fine for smoking in the capsule is 200$. - For your money, securities and other valuables there is a safe at your disposal in your room. We will give you the key of the safe on request. The hotel is not liable in case of theft or loss. - Please handle the key-card with care. In case of damaging or losing your key-card during the time of your stay we will charge 5$ compensation. - Do not forget to turn in your key or key-card at the reception when you leave. - We reserve the right to break the contract and stop providing services without any refund to guests if they are in violation of this house rules or if they disturb other visitors with their behavior. description: Many travelers start their journey around the South of Vietnam in Saigon. For others, it ’s the last venue they visit before leaving Vietnam. As frequent travelers ourselves, we understand the traveler’s needs. The Dorm Saigon was created with the vision of making your time in the city more complete. With all the essential services and facilities, and high quality throughout, we know that The Dorm will provide you with the best value accommodation. Beyond offering an incredibly comfortable and peaceful place to stay, our goal is to create a community of like-minded people from all around the world. Together, you can explore Saigon in the most fun and unexpected ways. If you are new to Saigon, you can count on us to have your back. With our local knowledge on tours, nightlife, and other services, we are always ready to help you find the hidden gems in this the most vibrant city in Vietnam. We will ensure you make the most of your trip.  View House Rules

description: Vy Da Backpacker Hostel 2 is a hub for travelers who wish to meet new people and share stories of their journey around the world. We are located in the heart of Saigon, all main attractions are within walking distance. Staying at our hostel, you will have full experience of the local perspective as you will get to explore around easily. PLEASE NOTE THAT THERE ARE TWO VY DA HOSTELS. We are Vy Da Backpacker Hostel 2 situated in the neighborhood of backpacker area. Guests are advised to follow the address provided to avoid arriving in wrong location. If you are travelling on a budget and looking toward to getting local perspectives, Vy Da Hostel 2 is the perfect choice for you. There are many local food carts on two sides of the streets in the neighborhood. The hostel is only 3-minute walk to the well-known pub street, Bui Vien Walking Street, suitable for party lovers with crazy nights out, yet far away enough to relax and chill at the same time. Each of our mixed dorm rooms are equipped with all day air-conditioning, 8 sleep boxes with roller blinds and 8 private lockers. - FACILITIES FOR FREE: 1. INTERNET / FREE-WIFI ACCESS 2. SUPER COMFORTABLE BED 3. ROOFTOP AREA (THE BEST VIEW OF THE CITY) 4. FREE TOWEL 5. FREE LUGGAGE STORAGE BEFORE CHECKING TIME 6. PERSONAL BIG LOCKER 7. CCTV WITH 24 HOURS MONITORING OUTSIDE ROOM 8. PARKING AREA It is our ultimate pleasure to welcome you to Vy Da Backpacker Hostel 2. We strive to provide you an accommodation that’s both clean and comfortable, accompanied by friendly, attentive services to make your stay the most enjoyable of all time! Here are the 2 ways to reach us from Tan Son Nhat’s airport: Option 1: We provide airport pickup service 24/7 so it will be the utmost convenient for dedicated guests. Option 2: If you go by shuttle bus, after arriving at the Tan Son Nhat international airport, you can go to column 12 to get on the 109 bus (however, in case you arrive at the Tan Son Nhat’s domestic airport, go to column 18 to get on the 109 bus, it will only cost you 20.000VND), then show the assistant bus drive the hostel address and kindly ask them to stop at the nearest bus station to our hostel. From there, it will take approximately 15 minutes to walk to our hostel. At Vy Da, we will try our best to accommodate your every need. We also serve breakfast on top of a scenic rooftop from 7:30AM until 12:00 PM everyday (for about 35.000 VND per meal). If you have to check out early and require breakfast before opening hours. Please let us know in advance and we will try our best to accommodate your request. We also offer city maps and advice on popular sightseeing spots and tourist attractions. Also, we have Non la” (traditional Vietnamese rice-picking hat) for sunny days and poncho’s for rainy days, 100% on the house. Besides these highlights we also recommend you visit these historic sites such as: War Remnants  Museum, Reunification Palace , Notre Dame Cathedral, Central Post Office, Opera House, City Hall, Walking Street, Ben Thanh Market. We also offer daily tours which are competitively priced! - Cu Chi Tunnel half-day tour (from $15 USD) - Mekong Delta one-day tour (from $18 USD) - Cu Chi Tunnel & Mekong Delta one-day tour - Monkey Island - Open bus throughout Viet Nam to Cambodia (Phnom Penh, Siem Reap, Sihanoukville, Kampot) If you are considering on booking any of our daily tour packages a consultant team will help on designing the whole trip based on your desire and travel length! Again, 100% on us. We are pleased to help you to prepare for this amazing endeavor in advance and are delighted to meet you in person upon your arrival to discuss your travel plans further. Once again, your reservation as well as your requests has been dully noted! We will always try to accommodate you and your unique requests to the best of our ability. We value your booking dearly! Should you have any further questions, please feel free to drop us a message via our email. We are always willing to assist you.  View House Rules

description: Fully Indochine decor, a room in Saigon Old Town Coffee & Hostel has a unique decoration as well as unique facilities. There is a coffee shop with vintage style where you can enjoy a silence day in countryside music and a book as well. I really love to travel and I met a lot of nice people along the way that treated us so nice. As such I would love to return the favor and show you what the wonderful city of Saigon has and perhaps be friends. Enjoy your stay at my place! Thank you! Saigon Old Town Coffee & Hostel is located in the heart of the city, Bui Vien/Pham Ngu Lao area where you can have lots of thing to see - District 1 with a classic and Indochine decoration that makes you feel you are staying in a house of an old Saigon in 1980s. Rooms equipped with air-conditioning and hot shower, wifi available throughout the property. Peaceful and quiet to let our beloved guests can have a good sleep after a busy day of exploring around. Terms & Condition Cancellation policy: 1 day before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay. Check in from 14:00 to 24:00 . Check out before 12:00 . Reception hours: 07:00 to 24:00 . 3% service fee for credit card payment. Taxes included. Breakfast included. No curfew. Pet friendly. Child friendly. Non smoking except for specific areas. Contact first for late check in.  View House Rules

description: Welcome to Flipside’s original home in HCM City (Saigon)! It doesn’t matter if you’re looking for a cheap, comfortable, clean dorm bed for you and your friends to rest your weary heads, or if you’re looking for a party on the rooftop, a dip in our pool or a fun night out on our bar crawl right in the heart of HCM, we have you covered! Customers can Check-in at reception 24 hours a day with 24 hour security and a helpful travel desk open from 6am-10pm. Come speak to our friendly staff for advice & travel plans... Secure underground motorbike parking is available right at the end of the street. As we have a variety of dorm sizes we can cater for most types of travelers. As long as you're willing to have a good time, come join us, sit in the rooftop pool and sip on the coldest beers in town. What do you get? - Free breakfast everyday with fresh Tea or coffee - Lockers under the bed (bring your own lock) - Reading lamps and power points - Free WiFi - Towel rental - Air conditioning in all rooms from 6pm till 11am - Travel advice for Vietnam & South East Asia - Trips, transportation, open buses, visa extensions plus much more… - Rooftop bar and swimming pool! - Daily food and drinks deals and nightly events in the bar - Awesome laundry service - Free bar crawl ***Property Policies and Conditions*** 1) 2 days advance notice for free cancellation. 2) Our check out time is before 11am and check in time is after 1pm. 3) We accept cash or Card payments. 4) Passports & Visas must be presented upon check in as part of Vietnam Immigration Law. description: Overview Come and join us at the MOST POPULAR HOSTEL FOR SOLO & GROUP TRAVELLERS IN VIETNAM from the year 2017-2019 awarded by Travelinglifestyle, Hostelworld & Booking.com website. * * * * * * * Our price includes: - Free breakfast on 07:00 AM to 09:30 AM (vegetable, eggs, bread...) - Free coffee / tea during breakfast. - Free cold beer's & mixer on Happy Hour (07-09 PM) at night every day - Free high-speed WI-FI throughout our building - Free Air conditioning at all rooms include common room - Free City Map - Free refill mineral water at the hostel (if you like & follow our Facebook, Instagram) - Free big locker & backpack storage - Free showers after check-out - Free using 02 computers at the lobby with high-speed internet - Free Pub Crawl every night with Free shot at each bar - Discount food/drink from 10-30% depending on the weekly promotion/events - Free Friendly helpful staff at reception - Tour / Bus / Flight booking service (Paid) - Visa extend service (Paid) - Laundry service (Paid) - Bike rental (Paid) Location We're on Phạm Ngũ Lão street and are located right in the center of Ho Chi Minh’s Backpacker area and in front of the city bus center station within a 2-minute walking from 'Backpacker Walking Street' and 5-minute walking from 'Ben Thanh market' , one of the best places for shopping & sightseeing at Ho Chi Minh City. Guest can enjoy buffet BBQ & Pub Crawl and a lot of games at the Hostel to increase atmosphere in a big city at night. Extras and activities The Hangout bar provides Western/Asia/Vegetable food that can adapt to all travellers staying at a hostel, especially beer, cocktail & mixed drum. This bar is a great place to enjoy with new friends with music and games together with 02 Smart TV 50-inch for entertainment (sport, karaoke, movie). Happy Hour with Free beer from 07-08 PM and from 09-10 PM every day including Free Pub Crawl at midnight from 11:30 PM. Party game celebrates every night: Jenga, Beer pong, Flip cup, Shotgun Challenge, Shit Shirt, Neon Party with the big prize (Big bucker drum/vodka/beer) for winning team. Free Pub Crawl will be started every night from 11:30 PM with the free registration to all at reception, our western staff will lead guests to a lot of bar near the hostel to enjoy & discover nightlife in a big city with free shot vodka/wine to all guests at the bar. A place to relax, interact with people from many parts of the world, and explore the diversity of Vietnam. A coffee shop at the entrance serves popular Vietnamese coffees and beverages and snacks. description: Vietnam Backpacker Hostels - Saigon is perfectly situated on a lush and lively park in the heart of Pham Ngu Lao Backpacker Haven. The hostel is within walking distance to the hustle and bustle of famous Bui Vien Street and Ben Thanh Market. Boasting bright and open 8-12 bed dorms and spacious privates, VBH – Saigon and rooftop bar is sure to be the premier party spot in town. With a full service travel desk, 1st floor chill out space, and awesome nightly events, it is a perfect base to plan your travel throughout the country, or simply eat and drink the day and night away, with views to last a life time. - FREE Walking Tour (Tuesday/Friday) - FREE WiFi - FREE computers for guest use - 24 Hour Reception with English and Vietnamese speaking Staff - Airport Pick Ups - Visa Invitation Letters - Chill-out 1st floor with comfy sofas, bean bags and Netflix - Awesome rooftop bar with an amazing view of the city - Of course, our legendary FREE Nightly Pub Crawl We have awesome travel desk staff who are ready to help with all your travel needs. Feel free to speak to them about anything from local daily recommendations to full country itinerary planning including a visit to our hostels in Hanoi, Hue, and Hoi An; an escape to paradise at our backpacker beach hostel Ninhvana; a chance to chill in our NEWEST Mui Ne Backpacker Village; a rural countryside adventure in the North AND of course, we can't forgot to mention that we are home of the original Castaways Island trip in Ha Long Bay! General booking information: When booking with us through hostelworld, hostelworld will take a deposit to confirm your booking. The rest of your outstanding balance will be taken by VBH through online card payment. At VBH Saigon it is our hostel policy to keep passports during your stay. These will be kept safe at reception and returned to you at check out. When staying at any Vietnam Backpacker Hostel, you will need one of our VBH wristbands to pay for drinks and food during your stay. If the Saigon hostel is your first VBH, our staff will give you your own wristband on check in an. These are given to you for FREE and are yours to keep for other VBH locations. We look forward to seeing you soon! Cheers, The VBH Crew  View House Rules

description: The 2016 & 2017 Hostelworld award winner of the most popular hostel in Ho Chi Minh City! We are super social, mega clean and offer awesome value. Our amazing facilities include our brand new rooftop bar looking out over the beautiful 23/9 park and city, coffee shop, tour/transport booking service and ultra clean dormitories equipped with A/C, lockers, fresh bed linen and lights/power points for each bed. Our bar is a great place to meet new friends and enjoy an ice cold beer and we have happy hours through the day, 1 free beer per guest from 7-8 PM and nightly events including pub quiz's, beer pong tournaments, killer pool, neon parties, ladies night's and DJ's. On Tuesdays, Thursdays and Sundays we run our legendary pub crawls which are the largest in Ho Chi Minh City and not to be missed! description: Located in the heart of backpacker district of Ho Chi Minh City, Guesthouse Diep Anh is a modern, safe, clean, comfortable, warm-hearted and a very friendly family-run Guesthouse. Situated in an alley (directly back of Pham Ngu Lao Street), our guest house offers you a quiet place to relax after a day out with full of fun or in case you are planning go to bed early. With 2 twin-rooms and 5 double-rooms (3 rooms with balcony), we assure providing that 'home away from home' feeling, which can be hard to find in other hostels or guesthouses. Extra beds are possible on request. Deluxe 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite: it is a Room with 2 Double Beds for 4 person to stay All rooms are new, clean, comfortable and spacious (26m2) with big windows, high-quality equipments such as air-conditioning, mini-bar, cable-TV (with over 60 channels), private bath with warm water heated by a solar-energy system. All equipments are environment-friendly. WLAN/Internet access is available at free of charge throughout the house and certainly in all rooms. Coffee is free for whole day. Nearby are many sight-seeing, shopping centers, markets, pubs, restaurants, etc. It is convenient to walk around every sight-seeing spots. *ATTENTION: We have no branch, no relationship with other guesthouses, in case they have the same name. We locate only at: 241 / 31 Pham Ngu Lao street, Dist. 1, Ho Chi Minh city. description: Is it your first time here in Saigon and you are worrying about a lot of things? Don’t worry, we’ll give you ---Reasons why you are going to the right place this year--- FREE best local breakfast on the rooftop FREE WIFI access FREE local map FREE refill water everyday FREE coffee & tea FREE hot shower after check-out FREE luggage storage FREE use of hairdryer FREE postcard mailing If you’re still thinking, we’ll give you ---More reasons why you are going to the right place this year--- - Vitamin Smiles Team: we have a team of caring, down-to-the-Earth people who truly dedicate themselves to their guests ensuring that their stay is always memorable and fun. We are continually building our reputation to be one of the best hostels in Vietnam. Book with us today and let us have an amazing time! - Breakfast: we’re the only hostel in Saigon changing breakfast menu everyday with cooking ingredients is bought daily very early in the morning at the local market right next door so everything is freshly cooked and homemade. You’ll wake up with the best local breakfast in town and find out what is truly Vietnamese cuisine. - Staff: we have a high rating for staff. Our staff is by far the most friendly, knowledgeable English speaking staff you will meet in Saigon! We truly love our guests. You guys matter the most. - Rooftop & Kitchen: the only hostel in Saigon has facilities include a relaxing Sun-Moon deck (6th floor) and open kitchen & communal area on the rooftop (5th floor) which is an absolute oasis, and will no doubt win you over with its stunning Saigon views and calming nature - perfect to enjoy a beer with your newly-found friends in the evening, especially after a day of experiencing the hustle and bustle of this great city. Shared kitchen where you can cook lunch or dinner by yourselves. - Facilities: it features cozy & clean ensuite private rooms, super comfy bunk beds with functioning air-conditioner, curtains for privacy, power sockets, reading light and cool design. It’s perfect for solo travelers, couples and families. - Location: on a main street which with 5-minute-30-second walk, you will find yourself at Backpacker Walking street, the heart of Saigon nightlife, where you can party it up ‘til your heart’s content! And just far enough that the hostel street is quiet at night so it’s peaceful enough to ensure you get plenty of rest and recuperation. Within walking distance from bus station and only a few steps of all the action, the property is located near a local market, many street food vendors, restaurants, cafes as well as all the famous attractions including: Ben Thanh Market, War Remnants Museum, The Opera House, Cathedral Church, Independence Palace, Chinatown etc. This is the ideal place for travelers seeking the true spirit of Saigon city. If you are seeking for the local experience, willing to discover Vietnamese street foods and keen on exploring the Saigon market culture, then Vitamin Smiles is definitely where you want to drop your pack. One step out the door will get you in the thick of authentic local livelihood, with various day-long cheap eats lining the street. Early birds will be treated to a vibrant morning-market where you might gather local ingredients to cook up yourself in the rooftop kitchen. We also provide full range of services like tour bookings, bus tickets, visa extension, motorbike for rent/sales, airport pick up and drop off, laundry services. Check out our website www.VitaminSmiles.com for more information. Get ready to have the best time in Saigon. We will see you very soon.  View House Rules

description: The Common Room Project (TCRP) is anything but common, while you visit Saigon in a warm, cozy setting with everything you need to make your trip an amazing one! Instead of a noisy rest stop in the center of the city, TCRP is located in a peaceful alley on Nguyen Trai Street, District 5 (a few minutes from the center) where you can explore and experience the local scene while enjoying all the amenities from home.  TCRP will be the warmhearted highlight in your journey. The 48 beds in 4 different-style dorms welcome travelers from the loners, to traveling lovers and groups of friends.  We also have private rooms that rival any nice hotel, with service second to none. Staying at TCRP, you cannot ignore the rooftop bar. Not too noisy, it is a space for you to chill out with your new friends here, with a pint of beer and observe a peaceful corner of this busy city. And this rooftop also become a private place for your special celebrations whenever you want. We believe that a home cannot be a real home without any common activities between the family's members. We have games, musical instruments, cards, TV and comfy lounges for you to use and enjoy.  You can choose to have our wonderful, nightly dinners with both local and Western food, with folks from around the world to enjoy and share your experiences with, or learn how to cook true Vietnamese dishes in our cooking classes. Anything but common. That's what we strive to be while giving you value for your hard-earned money. Join us at TCRP and make your trip a relaxing, memorable experience you won't soon forget!  View House Rules

description: Ace Home is a private house nestled near the end of a single quiet alley way that separates itself from the major roads. If you are looking for a cosy place to relax and sleep tightly after a long hot touring day or a crazy party night, AceHome is your right choice. Just only a 5 minutes walk from bus station, less than 2 minutes to Backpackers Area and within walking distance to most of the key atractions of city such as Ben Thanh market, City Hall, Opera House, etc., AceHome is truly a hidden charm in this hustle and bustle Saigon. You can easily explore not only the local life around but also the city sightseeings by your own style. Moreover, the little green garden on rooftop will bring you a fresh peaceful atmosphere to chill. With a glass of lemonaid or cold beer, this is an ideal place to calm and rest during the day. Staying with us, you are welcomed to have: ***FREE towel use ***FREE WIFI access ***FREE local map ***FREE postcard mailing ***FREE showers after check-out ***FREE locker and backpack storage ***FREE Air-conditioned rooms from 4:00pm-10:30am ***FREE shampoo/body wash packets ***FREE book exchange ***FREE 24hrs check-in service ***FREE travel advices And: ***NO CURFEW ***NICE ROOFTOP BAR ***NEAR WALKING STREET ***CENTRE LOCATION ***BIG PRIVATE BATHROOM INSIDE EACH ROOM ***UNLIMITED HOT WATER FOR THE SHOWER ***ALL ROOMS HAVE WINDOW ***FRIENDLY STAFF ***VISA SERVICE ***LAUNDRY SERVICE ***DAILY TOUR SERVICE ***AIRPORT TRANSFER SERVICE ***NO SMOKING IN ROOM, BUT HAVE SMOKING AREA ***GROUP BOOKING WILL BE ASSIGNED IN A SAME ROOM. Reaching Saigon already but how to get to our hostel easily since we are quite hidden? – Don’t worry! Please look for the address 190 Cong Quynh street, district 1 which is just 5 mintutes walk from bus station and local market. There is a small alley and our signboard Ace Home on the street. Then,please turn to the alley around 20m, you will find us at 180 Cong Quynh street, district 1 – a lovely green house.  View House Rules

description: Overview Welcome to Language Exchange Hostel 1 - MOST POPULAR HOSTEL FOR SOLO & GROUP TRAVELLERS IN VIETNAM from the year 2017-2019, awarded by guests Our price includes: - FREE welcome drink - FREE high-speed WI-FI whole the property - FREE Air conditioning at all rooms (including the common guest area) - FREE City Map - FREE room upgrade (if the room is available) - FREE refill mineral water at the hostel (if you like & follow our Facebook, Instagram) - FREE locker & backpack storage - FREE showers after check-out - Discount food/drink from 10-30% depending on the foods, drinks you order - FREE student tour Our paid services include: - Tour / Bus / Flight booking service (Paid) - Visa extend service (Paid) - Laundry service (Paid) - Bike rental (Paid) Location We are located on a quiet street within walking distance of many tourist attractions, including the War Remnants Museum, Independence Palace and Bùi Viện Walking Street. You can have the best of both worlds – convenient access to sights and nightlife, but also a good night’s sleep! Activities Language Exchange Hostel Group features an exclusive café concept, “Language Exchange Coffee House”. It’s a unique place to meet local people and experience Vietnamese culture first-hand, learn about local traditions and values, practice new languages, make new friends, meet travel partners and expand your horizons. In a week, we have 7 events Monday: off Tuesday: English club: 7am – 9pm Wednesday: Public Speaking: 7pm – 10pm Thursday: Sweet Dating 7pm – 10pm Friday: Board Game: 7pm – 10pm Saturday: Language Exchange: 2pm – 5pm  We are passionate about helping you to discover the real Vietnam and to make lasting memories and lifelong connections with your fellow travelers. With our many years of experience in Ho Chi Minh City catering for international travelers, we have a comprehensive knowledge of the local area and its many cultural attractions.  View House Rules

description: Dear our guest, Located within the hustle and bustle of Ho Chi Minh City, Legend Saigon Hotel offers accommodations 700 m from Ben Thanh Market.  Fine Arts Museum is 600 m from Legend Saigon Hotel, while Tao Dan Park is 700 m from the property. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is 40 mi away. The property offers shuttle services at an additional charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fan, a cable + flat TV, telephone and mini-bar. Some rooms have a balcony with city view. Heated shower facilities and free toiletries are available in private bathrooms. Start the day with a English breakfast, Coffee, tea and orange juice are also served with additional charge. Guests can approach the 24-hour check-in, currency exchange, car rentals, tour arrangements and ticketing services. Free storage for your lugges is also served. ***We offer transportation from the airport which costs about 18 USD. However there is a convenient city bus number 109 (yellow) directly from the airport to the last stop at the downtown where you can walk to our hotel in 10 minutes. The ticket is approximately 1 USD (22,000 vnd) and you can buy on the bus. You also can order traditional taxi at the airport, however please pay attention to check the price before moving, we recommend you to take reliable brands such as Mai Linh or Vinasun, the total cost should not exceed 10 USD from the airport to our hotel. Now a day, people are also familiar with Techcar/bike via application like Grab or Be, the price for this route is around 5 USD. ***Tours Desk! We have special deals for solo travellers or private tour groups with cheapest prices than any other travel agencies. City tour full day  or half day trip Cu Chi tunnels half day trip Cao Dai temple and Cu Chi tunnels 1day trip Mekong Delta 1 day trip (or 2, 3 days trips) BOOKING Flight tickets, Train tickets, Open Bus ticket up North, Bus to Cambodia ***** *** Motobikes For Rent If you have any concerns or questions, please don't hesitate to contact us! We are glad to serve you the best we can! Thank you, Hotel Management Team  View House Rules

description: Overview Welcome to Language Exchange Hostel 1 - MOST POPULAR HOSTEL FOR SOLO & GROUP TRAVELLERS IN VIETNAM from the year 2017-2019, awarded by guests Our price includes: - FREE welcome drink - FREE high-speed WI-FI whole the property - FREE Air conditioning at all rooms (including the common guest area) - FREE City Map - FREE room upgrade (if the room is available) - FREE refill mineral water at the hostel (if you like & follow our Facebook, Instagram) - FREE locker & backpack storage - FREE showers after check-out - Discount food/drink from 10-30% depending on the foods, drinks you order - FREE student tour Our paid services include: - Tour / Bus / Flight booking service (Paid) - Visa extend service (Paid) - Laundry service (Paid) - Bike rental (Paid) Location We are located on a quiet street within walking distance of many tourist attractions, including the War Remnants Museum, Independence Palace and Bùi Viện Walking Street. You can have the best of both worlds – convenient access to sights and nightlife, but also a good night’s sleep! Activities Language Exchange Hostel Group features an exclusive café concept, “Language Exchange Coffee House”. It’s a unique place to meet local people and experience Vietnamese culture first-hand, learn about local traditions and values, practice new languages, make new friends, meet travel partners and expand your horizons. In a week, we have 7 events Monday: off Tuesday: English club: 7am – 9pm Wednesday: Public Speaking: 7pm – 10pm Thursday: Sweet Dating 7pm – 10pm Friday: Board Game: 7pm – 10pm Saturday: Language Exchange: 2pm – 5pm  We are passionate about helping you to discover the real Vietnam and to make lasting memories and lifelong connections with your fellow travelers. With our many years of experience in Ho Chi Minh City catering for international travelers, we have a comprehensive knowledge of the local area and its many cultural attractions.  View House Rules

description: CK Saigon Central Hotel, formerly known as “Big MaMa Hotel” has recently went through some impressive changes. The Hotel was built in 2014 and renovated in 2015. Our mission is to provide our guests with the most relaxing environment at the competitive rates.  We are conveniently located in the alley of Pham Ngu Lao and Bui Vien Street, the main backpacker area, in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City. The Hotel is just 700 metres away from the famous Ben Thanh Market and only 1 km away from Nguyen Hue Walking Street. Saigon River, The Reunification Palace and Nortre Dame Cathedral are within 2 km away. The War Remnants Museum can also be reached within a 2 km drive, while Tan Son Nhat International Airport is about 7 km away. CK Saigon hotel operates a 24-hour front desk, accessible by lift and features comfy rooms with free Wi-Fi access. We also have a rooftop sun terrace. This area is reserved only for our guests with comfortable set up for our guests to chat, drink some beer, or simply relax. We have 12 boutique style rooms in quiet area.  All rooms are bright, clean, tidy, furnished with flat screen TV with cable channels, tiled flooring, air conditioning, hot shower, fridge, wooden bed and wardrobe. With both private rooms and dormitories available, we offer various sleeping combinations that can accommodate all needs. Our lounge area provides guests with a space to read, use computers, drink complimentary coffee and tea, or simply relax. The Hotel also provides travel services to make your stay as convenient as possible. Airport Shuttles, Airport Transfers and Laundry will be served with a surcharge. We also offer car, motocycle and bicycle rentals at a competitive fee to get you around the area. Of course, you'll still see the same friendly, helpful, attentive staff you’ve always seen. So, come check us out and have a good time! Property Policy and Conditions: 1. Check in Time: from 14:00 2. Check out Time: till 12:00 3. Show your passport with valid entry/exit visa at the reception (I.D card if Vietnamese) for the check-in process. 4. Both cash and credit card payments are acceptable upon check in at the property. 5. At least 3 days advance notice for free cancellation. 6. Do not bring into the hotel: weapons, toxics, explosive, illegal drugs, inflammables, durians, mangosteen and pets. 7. Gambling or other acts that are contrary to good morals or that cause an annoyance are strictly prohibited. 8. Do not smoke, cook, wash or iron clothes in the room.  View House Rules

description: If you are traveling away from the noise and clutter of the city, this is definitely the place for you. Maybe Thoi Ta Tre 52 Homestay has facilities not equal to a hotel, but we will create a bit of tranquility for your soul in the journey to understand true Saigon life. Because I am originally a Backpacker who understands the difficulties as well as paid through life of backpacking. So when coming to Thoi Ta Tre 52 Homestay, visitors will be able to use the family's shared kitchen, spacious Dorm room without bunk beds, air-conditioning equipped room and wifi available throughout the property, there are separate storage compartments on the ground floor. Especially you can take a tour around Saigon, or Street-Food Tour to enjoy specialties of Saigon people, which will definitely bring you a feeling of unforgettable with a style of enjoying completely new than the traditional food that you often enjoy. description: Bienvenue to La Bonte! La Bonte, or goodness and bountifulness in French, is the very essence of what we stand for. The owner of La Bonte Boutique Home Group nurtures joy and goodness, everything she dose and that’s why boutique hotel is named La Bonte. We aim to provide the highest quality of services to our guest so they can have the most enjoyable, comfortable, and relaxing time during their stay. Each of our guest room is thoughtfully designed to bring out unique and beautiful aspects of Vietnamese culture. From the selection of bedsheets to our room, we carefully hand-picked the finest products delight you with. Free wifi is available throughout the property. Our boutique homes are located in centralized areas so they provide convenient access to the city center, popular tourist attractions, and nearby amenities that are just a few steps away. No matter how far you have travelled, we want you to feel home with us. So unpack your bags, unwind, and let us take care of the rest. La Bonte wishes you a bon voyage!ning dawn. description: KIM HOUSE is a nice accommodation located in the center of HCMC, close to the main backpacker area but enough peace and quiet. Renovated in tropical style, this green house is equipped with environmental-friendly furniture and nice plants inside. THE SHARED ROOM has 3 bunk beds equivalent to 6 guests with reading lamp, power outlet, thick curtain, all keep you private enough even though you stay in common space, & green balcony in front. THE PRIVATE ROOM is a cozy nook on the second floor with a comfortable, minimalist vibe. The room is airy with two small windows and big glass wall facing the street, plus the balcony beside. Here we choose GREEN & MINIMALIST LIVING with environmental-friendly furniture & nice plants inside. So we expect your cooperation for GO GREEN & STAY SIMPLE when coming to our home. description: Tôi's Travel Home Central is a very boutique, modern and premium hostel in Central District One of HCM city which is developed with a customer-centric in mind along with high standards. It's featured all the basic amenities that you might look for while traveling by yourself, with your family or even with a big group of friends. We focus on the level of detail, design, functionalities, quality of services and customer satisfaction in order to hopefully bring out one of the highest standards in many aspects of our hospitality. We'd like to create a place where you can feel comfortable and cozy like home, rest well after a long travel journey while experiencing the excitement of staying in the heart of the city. Our place is located in the central of the city which is just 2 minutes walk away from Tao Dan Central Park, one of the most attractive green space of Ho Chi Minh City. Also, it's located  in the middle of the 2 biggest central parks of the city (23/9 park and Tao Dan park) which will bring you the joy of enjoying fresh air while taking short walks to popular attractions and around Ho Chi Minh inner city all day long. Our special location also stays in a main alley when you are able to experience the authenticity of local life and people everyday, right in front of your accommodation. Most popular attractions, interesting places and local restaurants are in walking distance (such as Ben Thanh market, Le Duan Independence Palace, Takashimaya shopping mall, Tao Dan and 23/9 central parks, backpacker area, etc ). Very vibrant and exciting atmosphere for your experience all day and night. Nearby the biggest shopping streets for fashion, cosmetics, and foods in HCM city. Many 24 hours convenient stores are located just within walking distance away. Starbuck coffee, popular local coffee shops, and restaurants are around the corner. Also, nearby upcoming subway station Beautiful lobby and comfortable common area for socializing or working. TVs, Mac-desktop is also available for free to use. The shared kitchen is available. We offer all the basic amenities that I might ever need while traveling. A balcony is also available in certain rooms. Private rooms are in deluxe standards with windows, fridge, locker, luggage storage, lounge chair and air-conditioning House-keeping service on routine or upon your request. Very clean, private and modern shower/toilet rooms. Our theme and design are very minimal while sophisticated to create a very cozy, comfortable and inspirational atmosphere which will bring your the excitement and relaxation whenever you need. description: Located in the downtown of Saigon, Mai Home hostel hide itself away from the daily bustle of this city. A concept of the foregone Saigon has been carefully emerged and streamed throughout the hostel. It is a harmounious combination between colonial architecture and necessary modernity. Stay at Mai Home, grab a cold beer and gather with other nomads from every corner of the world to make your trip more exciting than ever. Our hostel offers 4 basic furnished dormitories to accommodate up to 60 travellers. An option between unisex and female-only, shared and private  will carry a comfortable experience for your stay. It is not just a hostel, it is a lifestyle!  View House Rules

description: Ben Thanh Market is built by the French located in District 1, Ho Chi Minh City. The market was started by Brossard et Maupin between 1912 and the end of March 1914. In many cases, the clock image of the south gate of this market is considered an unofficial symbol of Ho Chi Minh City. Over 104 years of use, the building, where Ben Thanh Dorm is located, still retains the classic architecture and is a symbol of Ho Chi Minh City. Featuring  air conditioning, guestrooms in Ben Thanh Dorm are equipped with a electric tea pot. Free Wi-Fi is available on site to keep you connected. Standing on the balcony of Ben Thanh Dorm you can see all the beautiful buildings of the city center. And just a few steps you can enjoy the special food and visit the bar, spas, shopping centers and night markets. Ben Thanh Dorm is very pleased to serve you! Your hostel, your homestay in Saigon. ***Property Policies & Conditions: 1. Cancellation Policy: 1 day before arrival. 2. Check in from 13:00 to 23:00. 3. Check out before 12:00. 4. Payment upon arrival by cash or credit card. - Extra 3% bank surcharge is applied when using credit card. 5. Taxes: included. 6. Breakfast: not included. 7. No Curfew. 8. No smoking in rooms, but desiganted area is provided. 9. Reception Working Hours: 24 hours. 10. Pets are not allowed. 11. No overdrink. 12. No causing noise.  View House Rules

description: Phung Hoang Hotel is located in central Ho Chi Minh City, only 7km from Tan Son Nhat International Airport. Free Wi-Fi access is provided throughout the property. This centrally located hotel is 800 meters from popular attractions like Ben Thanh Market, Fine Arts Museum and Tao Dan Park. Saigon Exhibition and Convention Center is about 5km away. All rooms are equipped with an electric kettle, minibar and seating area. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist the guests with the grocery delivery, currency exchange and laundry/ironing services. The guests can also rent a bicycle or car to explore the city. Located in the busiest walking street in Ho Chi Minh city, you can find the nice dishes or the leisure activities located around the hotel in just a few steps. District 1 is a great choice for travellers interested in museums, shopping and markets. Thing to note: Cancellation policy: 7 day before arrival. In case of a late cancellation or No Show, you will be charged the first night of your stay. Check in from 14:00 to 23:00 . Check out before 12:00 . Taxes included. Breakfast not included. No curfew. Non smoking.  View House Rules
